name: Mini Vitamin Enriched Face Base Moisturizer & Primer with Vitamin C + Hyaluronic Acid
about: Which skin type is it good for?.What it is:.Solutions for:.If you want to know more….What it is formulated WITHOUT:.What else you need to know:
ingredients: -Vitamins B, C, and E: Help replenish and condition skin with essential nourishment..-Hyaluronic Acid, Squalane, and Shea Butter: Help quickly hydrate, visibly plump, and prep skin for a fresh, healthy-looking glow. .-Grapefruit and Geranium: Leave a light, uplifting scent on skin. ..Water\Aqua\Eau, Cyclopentasiloxane, Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, Butylene Glycol, Ppg-2 Myristyl Ether Propionate, Cetyl Alcohol, Peg-40 Stearate, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Butter), Squalane, Glyceryl Stearate, Sorbitan Stearate, Epilobium Angustifolium Extract, Yeast Extract\Faex\Extrait De Levure, Beta-Carotene, Sodium Hyaluronate, Citrus Grandis (Grapefruit) Peel Oil, Tocopheryl Acetate, Methyl Glucose Sesquistearate, Pelargonium Graveolens (Geranium) Flower Oil, Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Carbomer, Peg-20 Methyl Glucose Sesquistearate, C12-15 Alkyl Ethylhexanoate, Tetrasodium Edta, Sodium Hydroxide, Panthenol, Magnesium Ascorbyl Phosphate, Limonene, Citronellol, Geraniol, Linalool, Chlorphenesin, Phenoxyethanol...Please be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package you receive for the most up-to-date list of ingredients.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply to just-cleansed skin, avoiding eye area.

reviews.review_text: I love Bobbi Brown products. I had heard great reviews about this primer. I liked the feel of it (how it absorbs in the skin), however, after two uses, I developed a rash and itchy red spots. Read the reviews as several people have had the same reaction. It also has a strong lemon scent, too. I plan on returning, and I also just took a benadryl.

I personally love this stuff. The scent is a little stronger than I like but it doesn’t bother me. I have sensitive skin and it hasn’t caused any issues for me. It goes well with my makeup products, I’ve actually ended up using it all the time :)
Didn’t love. Too expensive for me to feel like I could find something better.
Not suitable for everyone. This cream caused bumps and acne around my eyes, so I stopped using it immediately.

I use to use this years ago, found other primers and stopped using this one. I decided to give it another go as I moved to a colder state and my skin became dryer. My skin felt moisturized after and looked like it was prepped Good. But after putting on my concealer, it started clumping up. I tried to fix it, put my powder on and my skin looked suuuper dry. Oh well, I kept going bc I thought maybe setting spray would help. I WAS WRONG. From far away my base looks alright but up close it’s a disaster. It’s dry, flaky, patchy. I used it again with a different routine and my makeup has yet to look good with it. Time to go back to my usual.

I bought this for the Sephora sale in November and I love it! I definitely notice a difference in my makeup! I think it helps with my oily skin. My makeup lasting longer. I will be buying the bigger size once it runs out.
Absolutely LOVE this, is so nourishing and soft - feels great under my foundation and smells so pretty.  Highly recommend.

reviews.review_title: Definitely moisturizing but the smell if awful!
reviews.review_text: This product is hydrating for the skin. I took a chance and purchased it because this is a respected brand. However, the smell is awful! It smells like lemon pledge cleaning product.  It's horrible! I will stick with my Charlotte Tillbury magic cream. It's a shame because this would be a great product if they changed the smell.

This seriously makes my skin even MORE DRY after using. I was wondering what was wrong with my skin these past couple of months I was using this product and the way it made my skin dry and more irritated flakey

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Was just browsing around the store, and sampled this product- it was a must have!! I’ve added it to my skin care routine, applying day and night, as well as a primer for makeup. So glad I purchased!!

Has a nice citrus smell. Prepares the skin nicely but I feel like you can achieve the same outcome with a rich drugstore cream. It does feel light and not too heavy so that’s one plus side but other than that nothing too amazing about this product.
I like it so much. I will buy it again. It helps my makeup go on perfectly. The smell is wonderful.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am obsessed with this. I have never used primers since I do a good job being consistent with skincare, but this definitely added more glow, bouncy and youthful appearance to my face for makeup. My makeup layers really well with this. I highly recommend.

Really glad I only purchased the mini size.  Strong smell ( which I don’t really mind), smooth finish like one would expect with a “built in” primer, but absolutely NOT moisturizing.  Left skin feeling very tight and dry.  Maybe just as a primer it would be okay but doesn’t really go over other moisturizers very well.   Maybe for oily skin?
THE best product to have your makeup stay all day. Not tacky. Great for sensitive skin. Lots of moisturize.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently bought this and have used it about four times all with different foundations/tinted moisturizers and it truly is an amazing face base and perfectly hydrates your face for your make up. However, I hate that this is not fragrance free. First off, the smell is not good. Second, so many people have issues with fragrance in moisturizers and make up products in terms of allergic reactions so why are we still using them? I personally have not had any reaction. But it works so well to the point where I can ignore the smell. Hopefully one day they will make a fragrance free option.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have ben using this for two containers now. I layer it on after cleansing and adding hyaluronic acid. Gives me a lovely glow and at my age, I will take it!

While the scent was lovely this product made me itchy instantly. I’ve never had a reaction so quickly. It is also a tiny bottle.. not worth the price in my opinion. I returned it after trying 3 times.

reviews.review_title: I must have for my routine.
reviews.review_text: I used it every day it smell very nice just apply a small quantity.
At 46 and an absolute product addict  this is one of the best products I've ever used!
feels nice on the skin, didnt cause me any breakouts

reviews.review_title: My sensitive skin doesn't like this
reviews.review_text: I like how this makes my skin look but can't use it often as my skin reacts to the vitamin C unfortunately.

Really liked the feel of this product. I have combination skin. The face base mostly absorbs for a decent moisturizing effect, and stays a tiny bit ‘tacky’ - it really works as a primer! Made my foundation last longer and I did not get the mid-afternoon sheen I normally would. A+

I don't understand why there's such bad reviews. I actually like this product alot! the smell takes a bit to get used to but it doesn't break me out, and almost everything breaks me out. it preps my skin perfectly for makeup and it pairs well with my haus labs foundation. it is a bit heavy, but not too heavy for my oily skin. I can't afford the big size so I purchased the mini. I think I've bought 3 so far, and I'll keep buying it!!

reviews.review_title: A staple in my makeup application every day
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product as my base/primer every day for the last five years. This product works so well for those with dry skin or over 50.  The worst thing to see is someone with patchy looking dry foundation. This base/primer leaves with with a beautiful and moisturized canvas to apply foundation or not. Either way, your skin will look its best.

reviews.review_title: A must-have in my morning routine!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this product! It feels amazing on your skin. I tried other moisturizers due to the price of this one, but nothing compares.

reviews.review_title: I don’t understand the positive reviews
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Does nothing. Heavy and no noticeable difference except some breakouts. I usually like BB, but this is a miss.

This review is NOT incentivized. I adore this product. The smell is amazing and I normally don’t like most fragrances. It’s a light citrus smell. My makeup goes on smoothly and it has not made my face breakout. I’ve been using it for two weeks now.

reviews.review_title: I LOVE!!! Would repurchase again and again
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Literally my #1 primer and it’s worth the money even tho it costs a lot. I’ve been using it for a year now and it has left my skin so soft, hydrated and makeup flawless asf.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Terrible smell. Sadly, few and far between, incentivized individuals give honest feedback on these reviews. Please don't believe the raving reviews on here. When people don't pay for items with their hard earned money, they tend to love the product and the monetary incentives tied to selling them. We need to stop buying what influencers recommend, and start listening to the people with no followers spending time and money on products they believe in and giving us HONEST reviews about items in their content. They are easy to spot and they have no affiliated links! Influencers all start pushing the same lines at the same time because incentives for those items at the time can't be beat.
I’ve been using the product for two days now and I love it. Leaves my skin super smooth. I love it!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Works well with Chanel foundation! Expensive but is smoother and more moisturizing than other bases. I also use Smashbox and save this for big makeup days.
been using it since forever perfect moisturizer/ primer i use it always to prep before makeup

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: One of the only face creams that actually sinks in and doesn't sit on the skin, and it maintains moisture when many leave skin dry again or an oil slick.

reviews.review_title: Better Skin and Makeup Outcome with this Product
reviews.review_text: Such a rich product. Not only does it provide a great base for makeup but also enhanced my overall skin appearance!
I really like the texture it’s thick and filling and moisturizing. It is very fragrant and expensive though 😢 i like it more as a moisturizer.

reviews.review_title: DO NOT SLEEP ON THIS, I’M OBSESSED
reviews.review_text: I am so happy with this product!! From the smell (kinda like a very light citrus smell, it’s honestly perfect) to the way it feels and the way my foundation looks on top is just 10/10. Bobbi Brown always makes the best stuff and this right here is on another level.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: beautiful, hydrating, light, what more can i say. i use this everyday i wear makeup and it makes a huge difference. a little expensive but worth every penny
I ordered the small size to try and it really is the best base on my 52 year old skin.  So hydrating and makes the foundation lay nicely on the skin.  Will be purchasing the larger size.

reviews.review_title: too good i used under makeup very smooth
reviews.review_text: i never got that good finishing after makeup as i got with this BB . so smooth even i feel my skin so hydrating before makeup . face skin feels too healthy.

I've recently tried the Bobbi Brown primer moisturizer, and it has quickly become a staple in my makeup routine. This primer truly makes a difference in the longevity of my makeup, ensuring it lasts all day without fading. Additionally, it provides excellent hydration, leaving my skin feeling moisturized and fresh. One of the standout features is how it prevents my makeup from looking cakey, giving me a smooth and flawless finish. If you're looking for a primer that enhances your makeup's staying power while keeping your skin nourished, the Bobbi Brown Primer is a fantastic choice.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am loving the result. recommend for everyone. Getting glowing skin day by day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This can be a finicky primer but with the right complexion products it's pretty amazing. Admittedly, I hated this for a while because it always made my complexion look worse(pilling, separating, etc.) plus the fragrance is pretty strong. However, I recently found my holy grail foundation (Chanel Les Beige Complexion) and this makes it look even better! My makeup will stay looking fresh through an entire work day with a dewy, but not overly shiny, finish. I have really dry skin so I couldn't ask for better.   I would definitely recommend starting with the trial size. I tried the primer with a lot of products (including ones Beauty YouTubers recommend it with) before I found my match. Plus the scent can be very off putting... I honestly am trying to find a similar primer without fragrance, but will continue buying until then.

This primer works as intended, however the smell is atrociously strong and takes a while to dissipate. Can cause headaches if you’re sensitive to strong fragrances. It does smooth the skin nicely and works well for lasting foundation, and just as is. I find the scent very similar to citronella insect repellent. I wish it was scent-free :(

This product is so worth the price. I first got it as a tiny free sample with one of my orders and ended up using the entire sample so I had to buy the big size. It works so well with my combination skin. Oh and it smells amazing smellsamazing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It smells so good and it’s lasted me a while! It’s very hydrating:)

reviews.review_title: True to its name and description
reviews.review_text: It is a great primer and moisturizer. I love how the scent makes me feel refreshing. I wear in summers alone and underneath my foundation as a primer in winters. It has not my skin to breakout. Love it and will repurchase definitely!
This is a very nice moisturizer, I love the smell and the glow effect in my skin. It works great. I recommend buying the small size to try on your skin. In my case, I would buy the biggest size.
DID NOT CAUSE ANY BREAKOUTS! I have sensitive/dry skin and it did not cause any harm to my skin.

reviews.review_title: If you have acne, this stuff works!
reviews.review_text: I purchased this on the recommendation of an influencer. She was right, this stuff is great for acne prone skin. My skin no longer is flaky or irradiated. The one thing I don’t like is it smells like lemon Pledge cleaner. Is there a fragrance free version? Otherwise love this stuff.
I’ve been using this product for the last month. I received a free sample once and have been hooked. I love the smell and I love that it’s light and a little goes a long way.
It was ok ok for my skin.! I just dint like the smell.! But texture was good.! Needed something for my dry skin.!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, notSure skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Did not like this product. It broke me out and applies very thick on the skin. The smell was nice though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Horrible. It burnt my skin and caused me to break out. So disappointing I would never buy this again

reviews.review_title: Bobbi Brown Vitamin Enriched Face Base Moisturizer
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: 3-stars.  Smells decent.  Not moisturizing enough for dry skin.  Will NOT repurchase.

IF YOU STRUGGLE WITH TEXTURED SKIN PLLLZZZZZ USE THIS I BEEN USING WITH HAUS LAB AND LAURA Mercier AND IT HAS ME LOOKING LIKE IM NOT EVEN WEARING FOUNDATION!!! I’ve use milk primer with these and they do not go together  and I

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loved it so much, I think it was my find of the year. It hydrates my skin without leaving it greasy, - I have a combination skin.
Love it - feels so luxurious in its container, feels soothing and clean on my fave, and LOVE LOVE LOVE the slightly lemony scent!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: love!!! I have been using this for YEARS!! my skin loves this cream, it makes my makeup look flawless and also smells amazing. I will keep purchasing.
Super base! Hydratant, glowy, elle sent bon, elle fait bien tenir le maquillage. Je vais définitivement acheter le format full sized !
I wanted to love this product because it feels amazing on my skin and it smells so good but i got really bad acne

it’s an okay product for me. I have a normal skin type, and I bought this after seeing so many people talk about it. It does make blending easier but it doesn’t really do anything about makeup longevity so I might just stick with my regular moisturizer since it does the same thing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Do not believe the fake reviews this stuff is terrible. It caused piling under all of my makeup and enhanced my pores.

reviews.review_title: A little goes a long way!
reviews.review_text: I heard about this product from an influencer I follow and decided to try the small pot. She was right, the smell of the product is amazing. But so is its benefits! My makeup goes on smoother and I seem to use less. My face continues to feel moisturized throughout the day, not heavy. I've just bought the large one because I'm hooked now.
I was skeptical at first but it makes my makeup look so nice! Smells lemony. I wear it under the ilia skin tint and it looks great and is so smooth to get on.
I love Bobbi Brown products. but this was not the one for me. I applied before my foundation and it made it so patchy and dry . I tried it by itself and my face felt dry while wearing it.

reviews.review_title: Best Primer which is also moisturizer
reviews.review_text: I really like this product. Smells nice and dual feature being moisturizer and primer

I wish I’d tried this a lot sooner. I was really missing out on a very good product. The hydration it gives to my skin makes my makeup look a lot better. It’s smells really good, kind of lemony. The texture is really soft. Love it.
I was scared at fist because my skin is sensitive to scent, but it does wonders, livery hydrating and smooth on the skin. I have combination skin so I had no issues with that.

reviews.review_title: Moisturizing but doesn’t smooth skin before makeup
reviews.review_text: Everyone seems to love this but for me, it doesn’t smooth out my skin enough to be a primer. It’s definitely moisturizing, but doesn’t help smooth out pores at all.
I have been using this product for almost 2 years now. Whenever I use it, my skin feels smooth and hydrated. I love it!!!

reviews.review_title: Do not believe the 4k fake reviews. Do not buy.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff is trash. If I could give it zero stars I would. Maybe it might work for someone who has zero skincare routine and never moisturizes but if you have healthy skin this stuff sucks. It accentuates every pore. My normal routine blurs my pores my skin never looks this bad. My makeup literally slid off of my face within three hours. Nothing would stick to my foundation either. Blush bronzer. All over it. Just slid right off. What didn’t slide off? Broke apart. This is my makeup after a 9 hour day. Normally I use smash box Marilyn’s because it’s a super for Tim ford but I’m just gonna buy the Tom ford when I return this actual garbage.
I used it twice and got acne. Conclusion is simple: product is horrible!
Just received & used this for the first time today. I’m impressed. Didn’t realize it was a moisturizer & primer but it works so well. Left my skin so soft & supple with a nice glow. Would buy again.
Works great on my dry mature skin but I can’t cope with the smell. Won’t be using it at night for pm skin care anymore. In daytime with layering other makeup over it the smell dissipates at least.
I have dry/sensitive skin & this irritated my skin. Purchased because of the great reviews, but did not work out for me. I would say that it has a heavy citrus scent

reviews.review_title: Add This To Your Cosmetic Kit
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I rarely give five stars to anything but the Bobbi Brown Vitamin E Enriched primer is perfect. My makeup stays put all day without drying out my complexion. I also like the light citrus scent. The cream is light weight, not greasy. Great investment.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have used this for two years now and love the feeling it gives my skin. Leaves it so moisturized and glowing. Perfect as primer and wears beautifully under makeup.

Been enjoying this primer. Creates a nice smooth base for makeup to go on easily and evenly.  Works well with all my foundations regardless of silicone or water based. Love that it has skin care benefits.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Not bad but i was expecting more from it, it doesnt hydrate that much but is good base tho, maybe dont fit wity my foundation cause my foundation is creamer that this product

reviews.review_title: The product caused an allergy to me !!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: First time in my life I got such an allergic reaction to the cream ! It happened for the first time ! I'm a make-up artist . Professional girls, be careful when working with this cream on clients .. I use many cosmetics and no cream has ever caused such allergic reactions and deterioration of my skin
Smells amazing. Looks very thick but it melts into your skin seamlessly and a little goes a long way

I continue to repurchase this moisturizer over and over. I love the texture, the amount of hydration it gives and the smell is incredible. It’s a great primer but sometimes I use it as a nighttime moisturizer as well

reviews.review_title: Best primer I’ve used , a must have !
reviews.review_text: This primer was suggested to me be Meg an influencer on IG. I love it! It’s the most hydrating primer I’ve used on my dry mature skin . It helps my foundation go on easier without dry patches.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Leaves my makeup so smooth and pretty. Plus it makes it last all day

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this as a moisturizer and a primer. I love the scent of it also
I have combo to dry skin and this wears perfectly under makeup and it feels great. Not really light but not at all too heavy

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I used to have issues with flaking under foundation so tried this product. I do think it's helped, but I use several other products before makeup as well. I do think it's helped solve my issue, but wish it wasn't quite so spendy.
Amazing! It reduces the look of fines lines and texture. My makeup applies beautifully with this !
LOVE. That’s all I have to say, is LOVE. Very moisturizing, and all my makeup sits SO well on top of it.

I'm a certified makeup artist and I'm also 45 but I do take very good care of my skin and I'm told that I do not look my age. I have tried so many primers and I have been using this one for a little while as it was recommended to me by a sales rep at Sephora. I use it with Lady Gaga's Haus Labs foundation and Dior Forever Skin glow. Let me tell you my skin looks so smoothe with this primer. This stuff is like magic in a container. Unreal.

J'en ai mis une petite quantité sur ma main et j'ai rapidement ressenti une sensation d'hydratation et de douceur incroyable. Il a une odeur très satisfaisante La seule chose qui me dérange est sa taille, c'est trop petit ! Sephora, que se passe-t-il avec la taille des produits ? Affff

This product smells bad and has wayy too much fragrance. To put this on your face is not enjoyable as the smell is so strong. I usually dont mind a bit of fragrance in my skin care but this is exaggerated

reviews.review_title: Coming from someone who’s tried it all. You need.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have never written a review before but for this I HAD too. I have very dry and acne prone skin so I wanted to splurge on a moisturizer. I have tried first aid beauty, tatcha, drunk elephant, and every drug store moisturizer you can imagine. This is the only moisturizer that has given me this much hydration without breaking me out. I use it in the morning and at night or for a makeup primer and it does it all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample and I fell in love. There's a scent to it but it is not strong or overpowering at all. The scent goes away. Also, my skin feels smooth after using this. It's just expensive lol

I have tried a lot of primers and this is by far the best. It provides a nice finish. Not quite dewy but a soft glow. I am beyond impressed with this primer/moisturizer. Will most definitely buy again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Have purchased this so many times! Love this product and how my makeup looks on top of it.

reviews.review_title: If you have flakey dry skin patches,you’ll love it
reviews.review_text: This was a game changer for my dry patches, I have combination skin with some serious dermatitis and eczema issues around my mouth area and wow did this help, it’s not a cure all but it was a world of difference using this compared to a sticky gel primer.

reviews.review_title: Love for my acne prone skin
reviews.review_text: I have sensitive, acne prone skin with large pores and this product not only blurs the skin but it doesn’t irritate it. I’ve noticed my skin is a lot brighter and less textured.
Really nice moisturizer...doesn't feel greasy on the face.  I have combination skin and never had issues with breakouts or dryness.
I been wanting to try this product based off the reviews and people have mentioned it to me. So I finally had ordered it and let me just say I love it! Makes my makeup look so smooth.

Saw Jeffree Star do a review on this and he really liked it so thought I would give it a try. It's pretty good stuff but doesn't hide the fine lines and wrinkles as well as I had hoped. But over all, still a good product

I heard so much about this product so decided to get it. It dry fast and works good, your foundation last longer with it. If you don't' want to apply foundation first on your skin and want something between skin and foundation this product is good! i didn't give 5 stars because I hope it will make my pores less visible but unfortunately they stay as they were.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Holy Grail! 40+ must have! Everything goes on smoother. Have re-purchased time and time again.
Feels like a skincare primer. I’m not sure if this helps my makeup last longer but it does make my skin more glowy. I also like the citrus smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE this product! My skin is so smooth and my makeup looks so good! It’s also helped with my acne!
I recently purchased the mini to try as I have heard that it is a great product. There was no lie told! This product makes your makeup look flawless! Can’t wait to get the full sized product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best primer I have ever used. Pair it will the eye primer & your makeup doesn’t move.

reviews.review_title: Smells great and works even better
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Im loving this Bobbi Brown Vitamin Enriched Face Base. It multitasks, works as both my moisturizer and primer. It smells so good, the citrus scent just makes me happy. It absorbs well into my skin and you can immediately tell the difference.

reviews.review_title: This is the best product I’ve ever used!!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I can never go without repurchasing it. It is an amazing primer and moisturizer, makes your face feel so soft and keeps your makeup on beautifully. Good for all skin types! Clean and refreshing smell. It’s so good for you!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is really a great primer and all. But unfortunately, i dont think this is for an oily face like me. I got so many pimples while using this and hated the fact that I cant use this anymore.
Moisturized my skin really well and helped my makeup last but emphasized my fine lines. I would not repurchase. I like the too faced hydrating printer better!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This face base is heaven sent! Your makeup sits so beautifully on this. I wore it under the eft halo and Ilia skin tint and WOW! Talk about natural looking makeup. It didn’t even smudge! The cream bronzer and blush stayed on and where they were placed. I don’t know if I’ll ever not use this when doing my makeup! It has great ingredients. Definitely a must try. I have oily skin and didn’t clog my pores or make greasy. Will be buying more when I run out.
Glad I got this when I did. Makeup has improved and stayed on longer, also happy how good my skin feels with it even without the days I use makeup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently recieved the Bobbi Brown Vitamin Enriched Face Base and I have to say, it has become a permanent staple in my daily skincare routine. Not only is it a fantastic face moisturizer, but it doubles as a foundation primer as well. This multi-tasking product has truly changed the game for me.  One of the things I love most about this face base is how well it absorbs into my skin. It instantly sinks in without leaving any greasy or sticky residue behind. My skin feels hydrated and smooth after application, making it the perfect canvas for makeup.  Speaking of makeup, the Bobbi Brown Face Base also doubles as a primer and boy does it do the job well. My foundation glides on effortlessly and lasts all day without any creasing or fading. It creates a flawless base for my makeup, allowing it to look airbrushed and flawless.  But the real standout feature of this product is the smell. It has a beautiful, refreshing scent that is not overwhelming or artificial. Applying it in the morning is like a mini aromatherapy session, giving me a burst of energy and starting my day off on a positive note.  I have also noticed that my skin looks brighter and more radiant since I started using the Bobbi Brown Face Base. Its formula is enriched with vitamins and antioxidants that help nourish and protect my skin. And as someone with sensitive skin, I appreciate that it is free from parabens and sulfates.  In conclusion, the Bobbi Brown Face Base has truly exceeded my expectations and I cannot imagine my skincare routine without it. It is a high-quality product that delivers on its promises and has become a must-have for me. I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a moisturizer that also works as a primer. Trust me, you won't be disappointed!

I immediately noticed improvement in  my face makeup. My skin looks hydrated and plump. The formula is rich, and a little goes a long way. The formula didn't leave any greasy feeling on my skin, which I have experienced with other face primers in the past. This is a great face primer if you have dry skin.

reviews.review_text: I am so glad I got to try the Bobbi Brown Vitamin Enriched Face Base, and let me tell you…I love it! First of all, the SMELL! It smells like fresh lemons, but the sweet ones. Heavenly! It contains vitamins B, C, and E, as well as Hyaluronic Acid, Squalane, and Shea Butter. I was SO nervous that because it had Shea Butter in it that it would be thick and greasy. I was so pleasantly surprised at how thin this formula is! You can use it day or night as just a moisturizer, or you can use it as a primer under foundation! I think it does a great job as a primer not because of filling in pores like the typical primers do, but to keep your skin moisturized and protected under the makeup. I did notice some pore blur, just not a complete fill-in. I loved this product so much! I could smell it ALL day which I personally loved - a nice, fresh, light scent!

reviews.review_text: Combining the effects of aging skin (37) and harsh winter weather, my skin has been losing its moisture. As a result, my foundation has been looking patchy, making it difficult to wear. That's why I was excited to try this innovative skincare-made-for-makeup face primer. The key ingredient in it is shea butter, which makes it feel rich and creamy as you work it in. Although the primer is expensive, I only need a tiny amount to cover my entire face. Immediately after using it, my skin felt hydrated and smooth. After a week of using it regularly, I noticed a significant improvement in my skin and how my foundation looked. I even found myself using it without applying makeup and it made my skin feel hydrated, glowy, and soft. This primer has been a lifesaver for my aging skin and I will purchase it again and again!

The Bobbi Brown Vitamin Enriched Face Base is a makeup game-changer! This multivitamin-enriched moisturizing primer not only nourishes and plumps my skin but also creates the perfect canvas for foundation. The blend of Vitamin B, C, and E, along with Hyaluronic Acid and Shea Butter, provides essential nourishment and hydration. The real results speak for themselves – my makeup applies smoothly, looks flawless, and my skin feels nourished and healthy. A must-have for a radiant, well-prepped complexion!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been dying to try this product for years now!! So happy to finally get my hands on it and I can say it's amazing. Smells good, kinda citrusy and absorbs quickly but still leaves skin feeling perfectly prepped for makeup. My makeup always looks flawless and dewy whenever I use this!!  If you're super super oily it might not be beat for you. I'm semi oily but I love the dewy look so this works perfectly for me. Doesn't break me out either.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have normal-to-(very) dry skin. As someone who masks often, uses a retinoid, and experiences allergic rhinitis on a daily basis, I find that I am no stranger to flaky skin around my t-zone area (especially around my mouth), making it almost impossible for me to apply makeup due to it merely emphasizing the flaky dryness of my skin. Out of all the primers I've tried, this is the best primer at moisturizing and smoothing out the texture of my skin! (I still use a separate moisturizer underneath though.) It can sting to apply this if your skin is sensitized, so be warned, but no other primer has made my cheaper makeup look and apply so well. I feel that I don't need to use a whole lot of product to get the best result, so each jar lasts me awhile.  I recommend purchasing the trial size before committing to a full jar. My trial size has lasted me a good 2 yrs since I rarely wear makeup, but I find that when I don't use this primer, my makeup doesn't look nearly as good. Keep in mind that if your skin is peeling excessively (as in, the primer doesn't work as well at masking the flakes), consider first that you may be overexfoliating. Monitor your skincare, and this primer will treat you well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This primer is a great formula!! Helps to moisturize my skin, and make my foundation stay in place. Not too creamy but, but still moisturizing and goes on smoothly. It also has a really fresh smell to it!

reviews.review_title: Moisture and prep all in one!

reviews.review_text: One of my favorite products to wear under foundation. I apply sunblock and makeup over it. My skin looks smooth and hydrated all day. I will also wear this at night, and I wake up, looking hydrated and glowing.
I cannot believe i don’t see more people using this. This product is phenomenal. Get the mini to try it with your skin and makeup/skincare combo. It keeps my dry spots hydrated all day long.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_title: Must have in your makeup bag

This stuff hydrates my skin, making it a smooth canvas for makeup. It's light and doesn't make me feel oily, plus it has a nice subtle scent that feels fancy. Even when I'm not wearing much makeup, it gives a natural, dewy glow. It's a bit pricey, but for the quality and how long it lasts, I think it's worth the splurge.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This vitamin enriched face base and moisturizer is amazing.  This product has left my skin feeling ultra hydrated, smoother and plumper than before. And can we talk about my foundation on top of it!!!! I applied my foundation over the face base and it went on so smooth and nice. I love that this is a 2 in 1.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this is such. good primer. it makes my skin look and feel so soft and smooth and smooths out the texture on my skin. I used it before I wore my makeup and it made my makeup go on so perfectly. I love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product from the brand and I am so happy I did! This product really acted as a great base for my makeup and kept my skin looking nice and glowy!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm obsessed with the rich, creamy, non-greasy texture! It has a light, fresh scent to it,nothing overpowering. The formula is enriched with vitamin C, E, and B, which provides hydration and gives my skin a beautiful, healthy looking glow. I would definitely recommend this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Final got to try the vitamin enriched face base I love that it’s multi use you can use it as a primer and a moisturizer. Very nourishing on the skin and leaves your skin super plumped. Also gives you all the hydration you need. So excited to add this in my collection.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this face base! It's super nourishing, goes on smoothly, and most importantly my makeup stays on all day and looks great! After removing my skin feels hydrated and smooth. I have used this as a night cream as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this face base. It works amazing as a moisturizer day and night. It makes my skin so soft and I have not broken out with this moisturizer. I highly recommend this to anyone who needs a great base and moisturizer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product from the brand and I am so happy I did! This product really acted as a great base for my makeup and kept my skin looking nice and glowy! I would definitely recommend it to others!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Was gifted this but I’ve Literally been waiting for this to arrive. I’ve been wanting to try this for so long! I’m so glad to get my hands on this. Everyone says it’s a holy grail product to prep your skin when you apply makeup. First time I tried it, feels hydrating and glides on pretty well. My skin needed this extra step.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have this product and when I saw the chance to be gifted this, I immediately was so excited. It smells great and it’s such a great primer to put before make for a nice smooth look! Definitely a must try

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is hands-down the best moisturizer I’ve had under makeup. It is hydrating while also feeling lightweight. This provides just the right amount for a natural, dewy glow. I let it set for about 20 minutes before applying my base makeup, and I was so impressed with how well it worked underneath.

How do people like this and why are people raving about this?!? It smells like lemon scented windex or Lysol wipes. It’s disgusting to be walking around in. I’d much prefer Tatcha. Don’t waste your money on this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite primer moisturizer to have on under my makeup. It gives just the right amount of hydration to leave my skin glowing. My makeup sat on top of it perfectly and did not leave any dry or oily spots!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love love love. Melted right into the skin. Worked perfectly under my makeup! Didnt mess up the makeup and my makeup lasted much longer than without. I love that it’s healthy for the skin while also working with my makeup

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The scent of this product lured me in.  It has a mild citrus scent that is revitalizing.  It moisturizes my skin and dries nicely.  There is a silky smooth texture to it that shows what a great product this is.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Bobbi Brown Vitamin Enriched Face Base is an exceptional product that truly lives up to its promise. As part of the Skincare made for makeup range, this bestselling multivitamin-enriched moisturizing primer does it all. The instant nourishment and hydration it provides not only plumps the skin but also preps it beautifully for makeup application. It seamlessly blends the functions of both a high-performance primer and a luxurious face moisturizer in a single step, making it the perfect all-in-one product for a flawless makeup base.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the bobbi brown vitamin enriched face base . I used it before makeup . My skin felt sooo hydrated and my makeup went so smooth on top. It’s the perfect moisturizer and primer. It has a citrusy smell but it doesn’t bother me at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I just received this and it works great! I used it right before I applied my makeup. It makes the skin super smooth for an easy application of other products. I love that it’s a combination of a primer and moisturizer!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This product makes my makeup look hydrated and snatched! It adds another layer of smooth skin. I don’t think i’ll ever like my makeup without using this first again! I was sent this product to review but all opinions are my own.
This really is a great primer but minus one star for the smell. Everyone likes the smell but it smells like cleaning products to me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am truly obsessed with this cream, it feels so good and light on my skin. The packaging itself was really giving for me. It makes you feel so boujie and the perfect size to put in my skincare fridge

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product because it hydrates my skin while still making my makeup look flawless. There is a reason this is such a cult product and I understand why after using this product. I will cont to repurchase.

I also changed foundations and Haus Labs is what I am using with this and they just work sooo so well together!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: The perfect moisturizing and primer combo

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_title: One of the best on the market!

reviews.review_text: I love this moisturizer! It feels amazing under makeup and it lasts all day. This jar lasts forever! This works great for my skin type as well. I really am loving this product. I cannot wait to continue to use this product!

Great primer that’s hydrating and good for your skin. This product is definitely worth the hype and made my base completely flawless. Going to be my go to for a perfect hydrating primer. Highly recommend

reviews.review_text: I love how moisturizing this makes my face and how easy and smooth it makes my make up go on! I would recommend this product as it leaves your skin feeling great! I can’t wait to continue to use it and see it’s effects!

I have super dry skin and it does help to moisturize a bit before I apply makeup, but I don’t really notice a huge difference between when I use it and when I just use my regular moisturizer. Probably won’t be repurchasing because the price point doesn’t seem reasonable for the lack of benefits I’m receiving from the product.
This is a super product. I really like and recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_text: Thus a tally makes a difference. I have old skin with wrinkles. CC or BB cream or any foundation emphasize those wrinkles making me look worse. I have very little discoloration. When I got “my face on” for a recent family dinner my daughter said my makeup looked really good! I like that it is a multitasker too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have an oily skin type. This moisturizer left a greasy residue and made my makeup look cakey. I really wanted it to work but it was a big flop for me.

reviews.review_title: Funeral tears has nothing on this primer.

After 5-6hrs of crying off and on my make up didn't budge and remained flawless. I started out with the mini but am upgrading to the Jumbo. I am also getting the eye primer. I recommend this product.

I’m an acne prone girly and wearing this on my acne scars/ scabs visible lightens them up after wearing this for a full day, I swear on it. If you have acne prone skin I’d be careful due to it containing shea butter, but if bother you definitely give it a try!that doesn’t

reviews.review_title: A must have face base product
reviews.review_text: I’m very new to using primer. But OMG, after using this, there is just no going back. I used a couple more primer products from other brands but there’s none that does the job as fine as this one. I even step out with just this moisturizer, some gloss and mascara and I get my soft glam look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My skin is so dry on accutane. Makeup doesn’t sit right and this is the only thing that saves me. Slather this on before my makeup and no crusties or dryness anymore. I’ve started using this at night too and my PIH also seems to be fading faster since I’ve started using it. You should probably consult your dermatologist if you wanna use this on accutane because of the actives in it but it’s been a non negotiable for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this primer! It makes my skin so soft and helps with dry patches that I usually get with make up. Will be buying again
Definitely recommend this product! It is so moisturizing, preps up skin very nicely for make up and gives really smooth look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I can’t believe I actually found something that works. I have very oily skin. All over. All year round doesn’t matter. Tried all kinds of products and tricks but this actually works!! I read a lot of reviews that it helps with those that have dry skin but it’s been a game changer for me. I like a more natural look so I usually mix a foundation or glow product with my moisturizer. It keeps my make up looking great all day long. I even wore it overnight and noticed my blemishes were clearing up faster than usual. My ONLY complaint is the smell. It’s not bad, not great but it does have a very distinct smell - kind of lemony? Don’t quote me but the smell is definitely there, HOWEVER - it does go away so you aren’t smelling it all day long.

reviews.review_title: Good for oily to normal skin
reviews.review_text: Very nice feel. Could be more moisturizing though. good for oily to normal skin

It's a moisturizer and a primer and does exceedingly well at both! As a 36-year-old l, I need some smoothing! The texture is perfect for that!  A little goes  a long way... I can stretch the mini line than I thought possible!

reviews.review_title: Meh, not for super dry skin
reviews.review_text: It’s ok, I like the smell, but it doesn’t do much for my dry skin. Nor does it last all day and I paired it with the Bobbi brown skin tint, they didn’t seem to hold up together. I was expecting more for the price tag, moisture only last like and hour

Really does save your skin and makes your base look flawless. I was skeptical so I only ordered the mini size but it really works. My skin is oily with dry patches on my cheeks and this didn’t feel too greasy on the oily parts and was hydrating enough for the dry parts to make my base makeup go on super smooth

This is the best primer I have EVER used. I never knew my make up could look this good. make up applies smoothe like butter with this. I can't get over how good it looks after application. totally worth the price.

reviews.review_title: Decent for normal and oily skin
reviews.review_text: This has the grapefruit fragrance, lingers a little. Definitely for normal, oily, combo of the two skin types. Even with prep I don’t like it on dry skin. Base products goes on smooth. I like other primers more
Didn't do much for me. I saw no visible difference in my makeup with or without it. Other than that, lightweight and smells nice.
I fell in love with this moisturizer. Smells so good. Primes my face perfect with or without makeup.

reviews.review_title: BEST secret to a fabulous look!
reviews.review_text: Simply LOVE this rich cream. All you need is a pea drop and your face will be luxurious all day long. I have tried so many other creams/moisturizing and all they do is shine in the morning than dry by the afternoon.  This cream keeps working all day long your face will look smooth and vibrant all day long. I am 50 and need a little help and this is my secret.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: i'm a combo girlie but during the fall/winter, my skin gets SO DRY esp when the seasons are changing. this literally saves my makeup and makes literally the worst concealers work without creasing. i got my hands on the two 50 ml set during the sale (making two 50 ml containers only $76) and honestly, i would have still paid full price though the price is actually insane. would def rec for anyone that's struggling with concealers creasing/skin flaking in the colder months.
I broke down and purchased this in the sale and I have to say I get the hype! It made my makeup look flawless!
It’s hydrating & smells good ! It works i love it! Definitely recommend

love this- works  well on my sensitive skin, nice creamy formula and doesnt pill when you put makeup on top 👍

reviews.review_title: Certainly going to get the full size!

reviews.review_title: Helping my skin more than any product
reviews.review_text: Ever since I started using this my skin looks amazing, I never thought a primer would be the cause of that after spending hundreds on other skincare products. My acne is gone, my makeup applies beautifully over top. I’m in love.

reviews.review_title: the only thing that helps my foundation look good
reviews.review_text: I have combo skin. so very oily tzones and Sahara desert chin and mouth area. normal cheeks. I have the worst of both worlds. extremely oily and extremely dry. I love satin matte foundations and I cannot wear them on my chin or itll look so dry and cracked. this face base is the only thing that can help nourish my skin and prep it for matte foundations. it looks gorgeous with armani luminous silk and nars soft matte foundations. both cling to dryness if I don't use the bobbi b or a very heavy cream moisturizer. this saved my face!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was influenced to purchase this product after seeing it in a few TikTok’s. It was worth the price. I have dry skin and always had problem around the colder months with my skin looking dry under my foundation and concealer. When i bought this my skin began looking hydrated and glowy again!
I have dry skin and live in hot, sweaty Florida. This stuff is my new must have! My foundation has never looked better throughout the day and all the credit goes to this product!

I wanted to love this product but sadly I will be returning. I have acne prone skin and after using this it broke my skin out even while being on dermatologists prescribed topicals. The fragrance is strong
used it a couple of times and I live it so far, I wish it was less expensive.

Great hydration for my dry combo skin with smoothing and plumping effects! For people who are oil prone - double cleanse before applying the base. Not greasy but hydrating. Strong rose scent, prefer unscented.
I loved this primer but cmon almost a $9 increase? As if the previous price wasn’t expensive enough. You guys literally suck for this. Gonna start looking for other shops to purchase my products.
I happened to be at a friends in desperate need of face cream, and she happened to hand me this one! I bought it the next day - a little goes a long way and it leaves your face feeling amazing.
This product gets rave reviews for a reason. Sets a beautiful base that keeps your makeup on and looking flawless all day. I wish it wasn’t so strongly scented, but you get used to it after a bit.

reviews.review_title: Not a winter cream for sure

Contrary to its texture I found it drying even during winters. I have used so many products from Sephora but I’m really disappointed with this one.
If you use this your foundation is NOT MOVING and is looking like REAL SKIN. I have oily skin and it stops grease from coming through. Heavily scented and too expensive, but makes a huge difference.

I have been using this product for 10 YEARS!! When I tell you this is the one product I absolutely cannot live without, I mean it. It makes your makeup go on SO smooth and truly extends the wear. Stay tuned for an application tip below that helps you get the most out of this product.   I have combination / dry skin and this product is super hydrating without any oiliness, but you’ll of course want to prep your skin before applying. I would recommend pairing this with at least a vitamin C serum and some type of hyaluronic acid (goes great over PCA hyaluronic acid boosting serum!!). But even my friends and family who have oily skin love this product. I really think it works for all skin types.   I have tried every product under the sun—all the YouTube / Instagram / TikTok viral products and notorious “best sellers” (yes I’m easily influenced)—I ALWAYS come back to this product. I refuse to do my makeup without it. Even when I’m traveling, I’ll make a special trip to grab this if I accidentally forget it or run out.    APPLICATION TIP: When applying, don’t try to rub it into your skin really well. Put another way, don’t massage it into your skin. Instead, use two fingers to gently press a small amount into the skin and do this all over the face. As you’re gently pressing into the skin, you’ll want to press upwards slightly, especially around the under eye area. I call it the “tap tap tap” process. It takes a little more time to apply but I really think this application style makes all the difference with smoothing out your skin / pores. And make sure to wait at least one minute before applying sunscreen or any other product!   If I’m having a big makeup day (like for a special event), I’ll use an additional primer over face base that is specifically intended to smooth pores. My favorite primer to pair over face base in the tatcha liquid silk canvas primer (applying only where needed using the same “tap tap tap” application style). Again, make sure you wait at least a m
