reviews.review_text: Finally a good moisturizer to use before makeup! I love the smell, the consistency, the feeling of hydration and how the makeup adheres better to the skin after using it. Although it hydrates the skin well it doesn't get oily consistency, I highly recommend the product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is such an OG product and it works so well. This smooths, primes, preps, and moisturizes your skin for suck a good base to layer your makeup on. My makeup doesn’t break up either, it just looks smooth. Gifted by Bobbi Brown

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Just tried this moisturizer/primer and I absolutely LOVE it!! The texture is perfection. It goes on smooth and absorbs well and quickly. It left my skin feeling quenched and was a perfect base for makeup. - Gifted by Bobbi Brown -

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by Bobbi brown I’m loving this as a primer and it really moisturizes my skin and gives me such a beautiful flawless look to apply my foundation over it. The texture is so luxurious and hydrating, a little bit goes a long way with this product.

reviews.review_title: A must in my make up routine!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've heard so many good things about this and I'm so happy I finally got to try this! It's a moisturizer and primer all in one which makes my make up routine so much simpler. You don't need a lot and a little goes a long way. There's  faint scent to it but goes away fast and the product absorbs quickly into the skin. I put on my foundation right after and there was no pilling or patchiness. Definitely worth it! I was gifted by Bobbi Brown.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is my all time favorite to prep, smooth and moisturize before putting on makeup! Not only does this provide the most lovely hydrating base but it also gives the perfect canvas to my foundation to stick to with no pilling or patchiness. I was gifted by Bobbi Brown and I can’t recommend this enough!

reviews.review_title: A Very Good Product with a Nice Citrus Smell
reviews.review_text: I love the citrus smell of this primer, and it works really well. I usually don’t use primers, this is why I haven’t finished my little pot yet, but I really like it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this moisturizer. I have dry skin and it soaks up this cream. It has a nice but not overpowering fragrance and feels like light whipped butter. When it goes on my face though, it is a nice, light, smooth moisturizer that has made my face feel so much better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This primer looks and feels like a high-end moisturizer. It is moisturizing and helped kept my foundation in place. I find that I only need a small amount of this, I used too much one time and it made my makeup look so unnatural, so a little goes a long way. Gifted by Bobby brown

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a very smooth primer. My makeup applied very nicely and seemed to stay all day. Not scented & easy to apply. I also love the packaging. The little jar is very nice quality. Gifted by Bobbi brown

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this product. It is the perfect makeup base. It is completely and totally for trying out. Your makeup will apply beautifully after using it. This product was gifted by Bobbi Brown. 100% recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this complimentary from Bobbi Brown for consideration but all opinions are my own. The Vitamin Enriched Face Base is gorgeous - it's like the ultimate primer without being drying or silicone - ish

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by Bobbi Brown. This moisturizer feels so rich and hydrating. I use it to prep my skin before makeup. This gives such a good finish to my skin after applying the foundation! Smells so good and skin looks plumped!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I especially love how versatile this product is. On days when I'm in a hurry or want a natural look, I can wear it alone as a lightweight moisturizer. And when I'm going for a full makeup look, it works as an excellent primer, helping my foundation adhere flawlessly and last throughout the day. It creates a smooth, even base that blurs imperfections and allows my makeup to blend effortlessly. Gifted by Bobbi Brown

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love the way this looks and feels on my skin. I’ve always been curious about this product. It definitely lives up to the hype! I have dry/combo acne-prone, sensitive skin, and have not had any issues using this. However, it is heavily fragranced. I’m not sure if I’d repurchase for that reason. I’d recommend smelling this in store just to see if the fragrance bothers you or not.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Moisturizes really well. I love that it uses vitamin E, it’s so good for my skin and helps give it a glow. Perfect for layering under makeup, gives a really nice base to help everything go on better. Great product to add to your daily skincare routine!  Gifted by Bobbi brown

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I highly recommend this cream to anyone seeking a luxurious and effective skincare experience but also a flawless makeup base! Whether you’re combatting signs of aging, seeking hydration, or simply looking to pamper yourself, this cream is a true gem that lives up to its promises. Your skin will thank you for it! I did receive this product complimentary from the brand for review purposes, but the opinions expressed in this review are solely my own and based on my personal experience with the product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from Bobbi Brown in exchange for my honest review. I use moisturizer and primer under my makeup every day so I was excited to try this 2-in-1 product. I was pleasantly surprised! My makeup layers so well on top of it, so I will definitely continue use!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: 5 stars ⭐️ The Bobbi Brown Vitamin E Enriched Skin Base is a great option for those looking for a moisturizing primer! It’s very hydrating & plumping, serving as a nice base for glowy/natural makeup. Foundation lays nicely on top of the base with no pilling, splotches, dry patches, etc. Although I usually prefer my makeup/skincare fragrance-free, this skin base has a pleasant & refreshing scent to it (I think it has notes of grapefruit and Germanium if I remember correctly). Gifted by Bobbi Brown

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Bobbi Brown Vitamin Enriched Face Base was gifted to me by  Bobbi Brown. One of my friends always repurchases this product and I am glad to have it. It is a great moisturizer that is very hydrating and not oily. It is also a great primer. I don't care the scent, but like to use it in AM with light makeup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by BobbiBrown. This face base was so popular back in the day and I'm glad I got to try it out. I love it so much for my dry skin. All my foundations and base products apply great on top. Since it is hotter now, I just use this face base as my moisturizer and primer instead of going in with another moisturizer underneath. This has a lovely citrus scent too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this complimentary from Bobbi Brown. I have been loving this product so much it layers so well under my makeup and is super long lasting. The moisture lasts really long and so does my makeup

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by Bobbi Brown. It has a very silky smooth feel to it. A little bit how’s a long way. My face does feel more hydrated and my skin looks more firm after I apply it. My skin is moist without feeling greasy or shiny. My makeup goes on much better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted by Bobbi Brown the Enriched Face Base, and has been a game changer in my makeup routine! A little goes a long way making this product super moisturizing and a great base for makeup! My skin feels super hydrated after application, and leaves a nice dewy look. Definitely give this a try if your looking to step up your face base!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Wow this was honestly one of the best primers I’ve tried! Very underrated. Made my make up look so GOOD. I have dry skin and this did not dry me out at all either. Will definitely be repurchasing and recommend trying. This was complimentary from Bobbi brown but this is my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The vitamin enriched face base is my new holy grail! I received this product gifted by bobbi brown and so far the results are incredible. I love how it's both a primer and a moisturizer at the same time. It works great and feels great too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like the consistency on this product it almost feels like it’s going to be dense but it layers so nicely! It has a slight lemony scent but it’s not offputting at all and it dries to a perfectly tacky consistency. Its so nice for putting makeup on top, products layer really nicely and it doesn’t seem to emphasize any texture on my face. You can definitely tell this is a high-end product it’s seems like it would be perfect for a makeup artist.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First time customer - I have combination skin and I've heard great things about the Bobbi Brown brand.  I've been looking for a new primer and I am not disappointed! My skin feels and looks hydrated and helps smooth out any lines (gifted by bobbibrown)

reviews.review_title: Recommend for dry skin, not oily skin types
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by Bobbi Brown. The product is very creamy and does not leave a white cast once applied. It has a small citrus smell, and feels light on the skin. Unfortunately I probably would not wear if you have oily skin, I would probably only use as part of skincare routine. If you have dry skin I would recommend as it is very hydrating and gives a dewy finish.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This face cream is my new favorite face cream! It’s super light but I feel very moisturized after. I like how it doesn’t clog my pores and I can’t feel it on my skin. This was gifted to me by Bobbi Brown.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Bobbi Brown gifted me their Face Base in exchange for an honest review. The cream is a nice mix of nourishing without being heavy. I have combination skin and have been using it both for night- and daytime. The cream creates a perfect base for make up application and sinks in quickly.  One thing to note: if you are sensitive to scents, be aware that it does have a citrus scent. I personally enjoy it but know that some people prefer their creams unscented.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product for years on end. Everytime I use it under makeup I always get compliments about how amazing my skin looks! Definitely pricey but totally worth the splurge! Gifted by Bobbi Brown

This is my second jar of this face base, and I truly love it. The Bobbi Brown Face Base is an exceptional product that combines skincare and makeup preparation in one step. It's like a multivitamin-enriched moisturizing primer that does wonders for my skin. One of the standout features of this face base is its ability to instantly nourish, plump, and hydrate the skin. I appreciate how lightweight and fast-absorbing the texture is, as it doesn't feel heavy or greasy on my skin. It has become an essential part of my daily routine, and I can't imagine applying makeup without it. Gifted by Bobbi Brown

reviews.review_title: Instantly part of my makeup routine!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a must have for makeup! This makes such a difference to use as a base before applying makeup! My foundation looks so much better with this, and it feels amazing on the skin! I am in love with this! Gifted by bobbibrown

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I would recommend this face base to anyone who is looking for a lightweight, hydrating, and protective moisturizer and primer. It is a great option for people with dry, dehydrated, or mature skin. Gifted by Bobbi Brown

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is so worth the hype! I love this! This product is so moisturizing. I love the smell too. And the jar is big! Would recommend this product! It’s goes great under makeup and does not make it move around! Wear alone or under makeup. Gifted by Bobbi Brown.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Vitamin Enriched Face Base Primer Moisturizer was complimentary from Bobbi Brown. This product creates a perfect base for my makeup application. I love how this product has multiple uses. It is both a primer and moisturizer. This gives me great options for my skin. I can use this product for skincare and makeup. When using this product as a primer, I find this to be helpful for prepping my skin. As for moisturizer, I love this product! It is lightweight, creamy, hydrating, and plumps the skin. I also love the smell! It smells so fresh! This product exceeded my expectations!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So happy to have tried this 2 in 1 product. I love the smell - it’s citrusy but clean. A little goes a long way and the silkiness of the moisturizer makes it’s feel like luxury. It’s the perfect base before applying makeup!! Gifted by Bobbi Brown.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product was gifted by Bobbi Brown and overall, I think it’s great! The texture & smell of the product are both great and the formula is very hydrating! It went on smooth and made a great base for my makeup. I really like how smooth my foundation applied compared to normal. I would definitely recommend this product and would repurchase myself!!🤍

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from Bobbi Brown. I usually don't purchase or use face primers but have been pleasantly surprised. It moisturizes my skin and then my makeup applies flawlessly over it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this complimentary from Bobbi brown. I really wanted to love it but it’s not moisturizing enough for my skin. I do have very dry skin as a preface. So depending on your skin type I think this product would be good on oily skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was gifted by Bobbi Brown. I love the Bobbi brown vitamin enriched face base. I love it because it creates a perfect base to apply makeup. It gives my skin a hydrated finish that I love. I also like how the cream if very emollient and that you do not need to use a lot.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizer/primer blew me away honestly. I didn’t know what to expect but having a primer and a moisturizer together as one felt like such a great idea. It’s rich and creamy and left my skin feeling smooth and ready for makeup. My foundation looked and blended amazingly well on top of this. It’s worth every penny. Gifted by Bobbi Brown

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It was sent complimentary from bobbi brown. I am not much into primers and wanted to try this being a multi purpose product. I like the texture , a little bit is only needed.   It successfully  lives up to all the hype around it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This face moisturizer/base has always been one of my favorites and a staple in my makeup routine. It moisturizes without leaving a greasy feel and also smooths out your skin for a perfect prep before makeup. Gifted by Bobbi brown

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Such a great product! I have always wanted to try this moisturizer/primer and was graciously gifted by Bobbi brown so I was ecstatic to try. The product goes on the face after cleansing so smooth, I used a moisturizer before one application and with the BB by itself and both instances did a great job of keeping my skin moist throughout the day. Loved it!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: One of my favorite moisturizer/ primer. The consistency is so rich and creamy. I love to use this by its own in the summer timer. It makes my face feels so velvety and smooth.  I l always have a back up of this beauty.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: As someone with very dry skin, this moisturizer/hydrating makeup primer is a must have in my routine. This rich moisturizer has a beautiful, whipped texture that instantly hydrates, sinks in, and plumps up my skin. My makeup just glides on top like butter without clinging to dry patches around my nose. This is one of my favorite makeup primers every. Gifted by Bobbi Brown, but opinions are my own.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My new favorite! I seriously didn’t think it would be worth the price but it really is. I understand the hype now. This makes my skin feel so smooth and look so glowy. Helps my foundation look flawless. It’s seriously worth ever penny. I’m obsessed. Gifted by Bobbi Brown

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizer is no joke! A little serious goes a long way, love how plump and smooth my skin is after application. Makes putting on base makeup a breeze on top. Might be a little too heavy for oily skin types gifted by bobbi brown

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product is so hydrating and smoothing. It makes your skin look glowy and also makes your makeup look flawless if used as a primer. This is such a nice addition to a skincare routine. I received this complimentary from Bobbi Brown

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have heard this is a holy grail for so many people for so long. I was so excited to try this. First, the texture is very thick but glides onto the skin naturally and flawlessly. I LOVE the scent too, smells so fresh and clean. A little goes a long way which is really nice. Overall, it is a great base that puts together ingredients to help the skin as well as prep it for foundation. I received this complimentary from Bobbi Brown.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Bobbi Brown gifted me their Vitamin Enriched Face Base  I am really impressed with the Results especially on the first try. My pores look clear and I have textured skin so that shocked me. For sure ! It made me realize how dehydrated my skin was so I must say I am impressed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this moisturizer because it also works as a primer which I love. When I apply it, it gives me such a glow that makes my skin look so healthy. It’s so soft and smooth when I apply it and it smells like a kind if fruit which I love! It’s hydrating! -Gifted by Bobbi Brown

complimentary from bobbi brown. This is the first Bobbi Brown product I have tried. I liked the packaging and the smell of the product, light and gentle. pale yellow cream color. when applied, it does not weigh down and lay down in a thin layer. Holds makeup well and lasts a long time. I think this product is a bit overpriced.

I love this base for my makeup but I will say that this might not be all in one for dry skin. I have extremely dry skin so I have to add something dewy to have a base that everything goes ion perfect but I think perfect for oily, combo, or normal skin.  complimentary from bobbibrown

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product is great to help moisture and prime your face before you apply makeup. I love that it has all sorts of vitamins to make your skin feel and look the best. Helps makeup to stay on throughout day

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This was gifted by Bobbi Brown but I have purchased this two times in the past with my own money. This is the best face moisturizer/primer to use prior to using makeup, it’s literally the base before makeup application and would give your overall look a healthy natural glow. I love how smooth and nice my makeup sits on my face after using this I highly recommend this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoy the texture of this priming moisturizer. It’s very hydrating and creamy and leaves a smooth finish. It’s ideal for those who have more dry textured skin. It has a strong fragrance. My main con is the price. It’s very expensive and I think if you have a good skin care routine, I wouldn’t say this is worth the splurge. I would maybe get this again, but probably not.   *gifted by Bobbi Brown

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I started using this face base every morning a couple of weeks ago and I’m loving it! It leaves my skin looking and feeling moisturized and nourished. It goes on nice and light and the floral scent is definitely an added bonus! Gifted by Bobbi Brown

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted by bobbi brown this product and i’ve been hooked since. It is such a moisturizing base and it doubles as a primer.. what more could you ask for? My makeup stayed all day no problems and it didn’t feel dry at all. I will definitely be purchasing this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is too good! I use it as a cream for extra hydration during the day. Also I mix it with my foundation to get my skin a little refreshed look it I just use it as a under layer before foundation. Skin looks smooth and healthy! I was gifted by Bobbi Brown. And I will get it again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Im in love with it. Thank you for gifting me bobbi brown. Its so thick and is the best base for my makeup underneath. Im in love with the textjre and my makeup looks so good after putting this on. Repurchase

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted by Bobby Brown and it is such a nice cream! It feels very soft and luxurious. I love how light it sits on my face and doesn’t feel heavy or thick at all. Soaks into the skin quickly. I’ve been using it a couple of days and already feel like it’s working!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted by Bobbie Brown and I absolutely adore this brand! Their face base has become a staple in my beauty routine, particularly as a pre-makeup product. I wholeheartedly recommend this product to anyone seeking a superior base for their makeup looks.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by Bobbi Brown Cosmetics for an honest review, and I'm thrilled with it. The thick texture feels luxurious, and the lemon-like scent is refreshing. It leaves my skin feeling incredibly moisturized and rejuvenated. Plus, the packaging is adorable. Highly recommended!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by Bobbi Brown. This is such a nice moisturizer and primer all in one. I have really been enjoying this on its own and under my makeup. I do not really wear a lot of makeup but it does great with the makeup that I do wear.

It is a great rich-yet-lightweight and fast-absorbing texture, it layers seamlessly with other skincare and with makeup products, it grips foundation for smooth, flawless-looking makeup application, great primer for full makeup prep in one step.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from Bobbi Brown cosmetics and I’m a huge fan.  After applying it felt super light and refreshing, and really worked well as a primer.  I didn’t love the scent, but all in all it was a great product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Omg! I just used this for the first time. I wanted it for the purpose of a makeup primer. First off it smells so good and makes my skin feel so nice. I wore my makeup all night and it looked amazing! Definitely a good primer makes my face look so smooth. Gifted by Bobbi brown.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Bobby Brown gifted me this awesome product! I have used it for several days now and it has already become a staple in my routine! If you’re like me, you’ll appreciate that this product has a very subtle, light scent. It’s lightweight enough to wear underneath my makeup! It’s also moisturizing enough to wear alone! I used this product recently while traveling and it helped me fight the dry, airplane environment! 10/10 recommend!!

Bobby Brown gifted me this awesome product! I’ve used this product for several days now and I already find myself reaching for it over my other primers! This product is light enough to wear under your makeup and leaves your skin feeling hydrated! While traveling, I used this product as a moisturizer to fight the dry, Airport environment! 10/10 recommend!! And if you’re like me, you’ll appreciate that it has a very subtle, light scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This face base is seriously so rich and creamy and just wonderful. Works so well as a base for my foundation and whole makeup looks. It even helps my makeup last longer through the summer months. I even use it as a normal face moisturizer when I am just sitting at home with no makeup on.    Gifted by Bobbi Brown - but these thoughts are my own.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product gets so much hype and I now understand why. This product is great at prepping the skin for makeup. If you have combo to dry skin this would definitely be an item you wanna check out. It leaves the skin hydrated without feeling oily or slippery and makeup glides over it. Also a perfect two in one product when in a rush. This item was gifted by Bobbi Brown.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from Bobbi Brown. I love this vitamin enriched face priming moisturizer. It hydrates my skin and prepares my skin for my makeup application. It has such a beautiful smooth texture that goes on easily and absorbs quickly into my skin. My skin feels so silky soft and smooth. It does not leave a sticky feeling. I love the pleasant light scent that is not too overpowering. My makeup goes on effortlessly afterwards. I love that this is a moisturizer and a primer but feels lightweight on the skin. My makeup lasts all day long and my skin feels hydrated without looking oily. I highly recommend this wonderful product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product I am pleasantly surprised. Typically face bases I have tried in the past don’t leave a healthy dewy glow… But this one does! It’s very lightweight & does wonders for my dry skin.   *Gifted by Bobbi Brown. Honest review*

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Even though it's a little heavy on the fragrance, this moisturizer gives the perfect base for liquid makeup. After using this, the foundation glides across without falling into any pores. I've bought several jars but this one was complimentary from Bobbi Brown.

reviews.review_title: Gifted by the brand, but will continue to use
reviews.review_text: This was gifted by bobbibrown but here are my honest thoughts. I love how the Bobbi Brown Face Base cream works on my face. I have sensitive skin but the vitamin enriched face base is especially good. This makes my skin feel softer and ready for makeup. Love the fragrance, the texture and especially the results.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_title: Helps so much with make up application!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was gifted to me by Bobbi Brown and here is my honest review: As a makeup enthusiast always on the lookout for products that nourish my skin while enhancing my makeup, I recently discovered the Bobbi Brown Vitamin Enriched Face Base, and I must say, it has become an essential part of my daily routine. This primer is truly a game-changer. First and foremost, the texture is heavenly. It feels lightweight and silky, gliding effortlessly onto my skin. The moment I apply it, I can feel an instant surge of hydration. My skin drinks up the goodness of the Shea Butter, leaving it supple and moisturized throughout the day. What sets this face base apart is its ability to double as a skincare product. The infusion of Vitamins B, C, and E not only provides a much-needed antioxidant boost but also works wonders in revitalizing my complexion. I've noticed a visible reduction in the appearance of fine lines, and my skin looks more radiant and healthy. When it comes to makeup application, the Face Base is a dream. It creates a smooth canvas, allowing my foundation to glide on effortlessly. My makeup stays in place for hours without creasing or fading. The subtle Grapefruit and Geranium fragrance adds a refreshing touch, uplifting my senses. Overall, the Bobbi Brown Vitamin Enriched Face Base has earned its spot in my beauty routine. It's a skincare primer hybrid that delivers on its promises. My skin feels nourished, my makeup looks flawless, and I feel confident knowing I'm giving my skin the care it deserves. I highly recommend giving this product a try!

reviews.review_title: Fantastic Skin Prep Product - Bobbi Brown Vitamin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was recently gifted by Bobbi Brown their Vitamin Enriched Face Base, and I must say, it exceeded all my expectations. This product is an absolute game-changer when it comes to prepping my skin for makeup application. First and foremost, the texture of the Face Base is incredible. It feels luxuriously smooth and lightweight on the skin, making it a delight to apply. The formula is enriched with vitamins B, C, and E, which not only provide hydration but also give my skin a healthy, radiant glow. It’s like a refreshing drink for my face! What sets this product apart is its versatility. The Face Base doubles as a moisturizer and primer, which saves me time in my daily routine. It creates a perfect canvas for foundation, allowing it to glide on effortlessly and stay put throughout the day. I’ve noticed that my makeup lasts longer and looks more flawless when I use this as a base. Another standout feature is the subtle scent of the product. It has a pleasant, fresh fragrance that adds to the overall sensorial experience without being overpowering. I appreciate that the scent is not too strong, as it can be off-putting for some people. The packaging is sleek and convenient, with a sturdy jar that is easy to travel with. A little goes a long way with this product, so it lasts a considerable amount of time, making it worth the investment. Overall, I can confidently say that the Bobbi Brown Vitamin Enriched Face Base has become a staple in my skincare and makeup routine. It provides a perfect combination of hydration, radiance, and long-lasting makeup application. If you’re looking for a top-notch skin prep product, I highly recommend giving this one a try.

reviews.review_title: Cant do my makeup without it
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Obsessed since the first time I used it. Makes my ￼ application so much better, and actually helps covers acne and blemishes.

Texture: It has this rich, dense, butter-like consistency that absorbs quickly without leaving an oily residue. Make sure that the primer is fully absorbed into your skin before applying makeup for a really smooth finish.  Result: Did wonders moisturizing my dry skin and evening out my skin texture which made my base look flawless. I liked focusing the product more on areas where I had dry patches/flaking. Also had minimal pore-blurring effects.  Scent: It has a strong citrusy, grapefruit scent-so it may not be for everyone. Despite the fragrance, I have not experienced any irritation (I have normal-combo skin).

reviews.review_title: BEWARE if using a retinol product
reviews.review_text: My skin has acclimated over the last six months to a 1% retinol. For the last 4-5 months was skin was doing beautifully with the 1% retinol. Then I tried this Face Base. The first time I used it, my skin stung a bit. (At this point I should have washed it off) but I continued with my makeup routine. The next day I used it again. BIG MISTAKE. My skin burned and foolishly I didn't wash it off but continued with my makeup. By evening I had full-blown severe contact dermatitis. My face is bright red and extremely irritated. I suspect it's the strong citrus fragrance in the product that did this. So BEWARE if using a retinol product - even if your skin is acclimated to the retinol - this face base will cause a burn and irritation like no other.
It’s fine. Not my favorite. I wanted to like it but it’s a no for me. Plus price is to much

reviews.review_text: Buy it. Seriously, buy it. There is not one product in my makeup collection that I love more than this one. If I could only buy one high-end product for the rest of my life, it would be this one. Every single time I gift this to someone, they curse me, because they know they'll have to continue buying it once they run out of the one I gifted them because it's THAT good. Expensive, but so worth it.

reviews.review_title: Best primers are packed w/ skincare ingredients!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This face base is my favorite kind of primer, one packed full of skincare. It has incredible skin loving ingredients, and a beautiful thick consistency. It melts into your skin, and makes it glow. It gives your makeup a smooth base for application. I really enjoyed how after applying my makeup, it gave my skin an extra glow.  I think this is great for all skin types but especially someone who gets very patchy throughout the day and people with dry skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Great moisturizer cream and also a primer.  My face feels so moisturizer and soft.  The package is cute and beautiful.  Is a good product to use to prepare your skin before your makeup. I recommend this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It’s a nice product! My face feels so moisturized and plump after using this. The price tag is a bit much, but it’s a nice product. The bottle is cute and glamorous too! I love that it’s a moisturizer and primer.
I was not expecting to love this as much as I do. It is so moisturizing, perfect for my dry spots. Has a nice scent to it, not too strong at all. Love this, will be buying again.
I heard rave reviews for this product and although it feels nice on the skin and comes in a beautiful glass container, it did absolutely nothing for my makeup application. I did like the light scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It is the best of both worlds, as it leaves my skin soft and hydrated, I would not need anything else to prepare my impeccable base, it has a smell that is not unpleasant at all in case the aromas bother you, its texture is super light and it does not feel, I love it

reviews.review_title: Not recommended for combination,  mature skin.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Returned.  Stayed top of skin and greasy. Overwhelming floral scent that lingers.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Super silky and smooth feels amazing on the skin everything I try from here and I highly recommend to anyone looking for new skin products should try this brand out!!! Honestly I see a major difference in my skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: La mejor crema ever. Si eres maquillador es un must para tu kit de maquillaje. Y sino como maquilladora te la Recomiendo para la preparación de piel, el maquillaje te quedará súper lindo. Siento que es para todo tipo de piel O especialmente para pieles mixtas a secas.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This face base was really great for moisturizing my skin, however I found that it didn’t layer well with my nars foundation (I apply my foundation with a brush so maybe that was the issue?) It appeared a lot streakier in comparison to my usual primer product. Throughout the day my skin got noticeably oily (it is typically on the drier side) and most of my foundation wore off within 4-5 hours of wear.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’m loving this! I have dry sensitive skin and this has not bothered it. In fact, it’s thicker and more nourishing than my night cream!! My face feels so moisturized and plump after using this. The price tag is hefty, but it really is nice and feels luxurious
iam loving ❤️ the result, the result is good I have been using this moisturizer for 2months

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: All around good product - does a lot of things well but no singular thing great. It’s a good moisturizer and a good enough primer. I have experienced better products in both categories elsewhere. Don’t think the vitamin E does much for me personally

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve always wanted to try this! This is such a nice primer. It’s not sticky but it provides a nice, hydrating base for makeup. I especially like it for when I’m wearing foundation. I have dry skin and this prevents my makeup from clinging to dry spots.  It’s definitely expensive but you only need about a pea sized amount to do your entire face. If you have the money to spend on this, I highly recommend you try it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a fake changer! I use it after my morning serum and moisturizer and before my primer. My dry skin is transformed!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this and use it as a primer on top of my moisturizer under my foundation. It’s a really nice texture and smooths out my skin. I would highly recommend to anyone looking for a moisturizing primer! I received this for free in exchange for a review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this stuff. hydrating but creates a clean, even base, almost in a mattifying way. I think I’ll use it even more in the summer because I’m very dry in the winter. But my makeup looks great over it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Bobbi Brown gifted me  Besides the fact that I smell like a lemon pound cake. I love this cream. It makes my skin so supple. A flawless base for my foundation. I fknt think I'll use anything else after this. I have oily skin and this wasn't too heavy. Just perfect!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love how my skin feels after using it. My skin is hydrated and not greasy. This product soaks right in! My skin looks so healthy and glowy after using it too! ✨ This product is amazing to use before makeup which helps to energize and refresh radiance to tired skin. It also has one of my favorite skincare ingredients, Vitamin C!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: If you have dry skin this is the best primer!! It makes your skin smooth for makeup application, keeps the skin hydrated throughout the day and long lasting.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: When wearing makeup for a long time, it’s important to have a solid base so everything stays put and feels good too. This was no exception. I loved everything about this moisturizing base and would recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Literally used this once in store and ended up buying it after. It’s soooo smooth on and makes your foundation look way better. I love it, I also have sensitive skin and it hasn’t broken me out

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is a fine enough product. It’s good for daytime, but isn’t heavy enough for my combo-dry skin at nighttime. It has a sort of strange smell, but I can get past it. I LG doesn’t seem to break me out, and sets on the skin nicely.

Hands down the best moisturizer! Bonus points for also being the best primer ever.  I use it daily even if I’m not wearing any makeup at all. It just gives your skin a smooth  finish ,alone or under makeup. Absolutely love this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really amazing cream base. Love using it under my foundation. Keeps my skin hydrated. It’s not too oily.  Definitely my skin feels so smooth and moisturized.  It also does not crack up the foundation, which I really like.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This primer makes my skin feel so healthy & soft. I have oily skin but I’ve been gravitating towards more moisturizing primers because it keeps my makeup looking fresher. This one feel high quality and the scent is subtle. I like to bake and use setting powders, this primer keeps my face looking natural & not cakey.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This was gifted to me by Bobbi Brown. I really like the way this applies on my face without makeup. I have really sensitive skin and this doesn’t make me break out. I also like that it has a primer in it to wear under makeup. So far i haven’t noticed any caking or my makeup moving around.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: If I had to use one thing on my face this would be the it!! It is amazing!! It was thicker than I expected, but it goes on so easily and feels amazing. The smell is fresh! Prior to using this, my face would normally get oily throughtout the day and I always felt like I needed to wash it. I’d definitely recomend this products.
This feels nice but it doesn’t hydrate my skin, I would need to use another moisturizer underneath and I don’t need to fuss with so many products, unfortunately not worth the price

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Okay so, this may be a moisturizing primer for makeup but I probably will be using this even if I don't wear any makeup. It feels so nourishing on and smells amazing. I know some don't like fragrance in their skincare but this has a energizing citrusy scent that I love.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff is amazing! Has completely changed my makeup game. All of my face products go on much smoother when this is applied first. It leaves my skin hydrated but not greasy and is perfect for under makeup. It does have a bright citrus scent so keep that in mind if you're sensitive! (I'm not, I love it) I even find myself just wearing this alone on no-makeup days! Would recommend to anyone looking to smooth the appearance of their skin.

reviews.review_title: You need it even oily skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: TikTok made be buy it lol but seriously i can believe i was late and never knew about this product i have oily acne prone skin this didn’t make me brake out works for oily skin too you need this

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Been a huge fan of Bobbi brown product and this one is hands down one of my favorite makeup base! Ut really hydrates and plumps my skin but doesn’t breakup my makeup! Feels very luxurious on the skin too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have heard many good things about this cream and was finally able to try it! it goes so well under makeup. Most of the face gel/cream I used creates white bread or does not hydrate enough. But with this cream, it's able to provide good hydration and doesn't create white bread. Most importantly I notice my makeup looks more smooth and lasts longer without exceeding oil on my face after the whole day! Recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The vitamin-enriched face base from Bobbi Brown is a light, bouncy moisturizing cream that creates a smooth foundation for makeup. It has a rich texture but absorbs quickly, leaving behind a slight pore-blurring effect. It has the characteristic citrusy Bobbi Brown scent and works just as well alone as under makeup!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’m genuinely obsessed with this! At first i was confused how to use because it’s a moisturizer and primer but usually my last skincare step is sunscreen. So I usually wait 15 minutes or so after sunscreen before I apply this priming moisturizer. I’m not sure if that’s right but it works for me. My skin feels super smooth and my makeup applies really nicely. My makeup looks glowy and lasts longer too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was my first skincare product from this brand. I read amazing reviews on it but was hesitant since I haven't had good experiences with primers. Primers make my skin look dry, bring out my fine lines, and pills under my makeup. However, this does the opposite. It had a thick texture, but it melted and absorbed quickly into my skin. By the end of the day, my face continued to look hydrated and my makeup stayed put. I am seriously quite impressed with my results. It's a great daily moisturizer for me, and I will be putting this on my favorites list.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this so much. Very effective. Worth the money. I will always go back to this base as it is a great value for money. Very affordable and efficient. A little amount goes a long way. Try it now and you won’t be sorry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I normally use a moisturizer then a primer but decided to give this one a go. The moisturizer works great and my face looked hydrated. The only issue I had was my makeup didn’t want to go on as smooth and the primer part of this product didn’t blur out my pores. Overall not bad but just isn’t a product for my skin type. The reason I gave it four stars is because the moisturizer worked great but the primer part didn’t work for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like the texture of this. It's like a mix between a whipped moisturizer and a pore-filling primer. It has a nice thickness that smoothes out easily. I would use this as a hydrating primer for my dry skin. I wouldn't use this as my only moisturizer though. It has a slight scent to it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutelv love this face base. It's been in my wishlist for years and I am genuinely happy with how it performed. It's the perfect base for makeup and it helped hydrate my skin especially in these winter months. Definitely recommend

I absolutely love this face base by Bobbi brown! My skin feels so hydrated and great after apply this product! I use it write before I apply my makeup and everything stays on so well! I would definitely recommend

I love this product. The packaging is so pretty. Love all the ingredients in it and the scent is so citrusy and calming. The texture is not creamy/liquidy so you do have to spread it out a bit. It’s thick and so good for my dry skin. I’m obsessed!

This is the best product ever. It makes my makeup go on so smoothly and acts as the perfect base ever. Now I can’t do my routine without this. It levels out any imperfections and makes sure your foundation goes on smoothly.

This face base is so thick and creamy; which sounds perfect for someone with dry and sensitive skin. However, the product has a very strong citrusy fragrance. Luckily, it doesn’t irritate my skin. The face base leaves my skin feeling hydrated, plump, and glowy. It’s a nice product but I wish there was a fragrance-free version.
I like that it is lightweight, absorbs nicely. And it has nice fruity smells. My finished makeup looks is really good when i use this. I also like it has vitamins and shea butter.

This multivitamin moisturizer is amazing, it says primer but I also use it the mornings I’m not using makeup, I love how my skin feels hydrated but not grease after I use this cream (I have combo skin).    When I do my makeup this is A MUST HAVE PRIMER for me! It’s amazing how having a great pre-makeup product can improve the look and duration of my foundation.  Love that it contains hyaluronic acid, Squalane and shea butter but it doesn’t feel heavy on the skin.   I’m definitely repurchasing this before I run out!

This Bobbi brown vitamin enriched face cream is so nice and nourishing. It’s very hydrating and very good under makeup. It’s not greasy at all. It feels very smooth and light. I’ve been using this more and more.

This Bobbi Brown Vitamin Enriched Face Base is the PERFECT skin prep for makeup. It leaves my skin feeling hydrated and more plump which leaves a smooth finish instead of dry textured skin when i use a full coverage foundation.

This is the perfect product for skin prep before applying makeup! I love how hydrating this product is. The product is thick and creamy, and applies easily onto the skin. Once applying you’ll immediately feel how hydrating the product is and see how glowy and plump it will make your skin look! (Plus I love the smell of the product!)

I love the way it makes my skin feel! It creates a smooth canvas for my makeup to sit on and it has moisturizing properties. I love the smell of it - not to overbearing for me and the consistency is very rich and creamy. It had my makeup SITTING, okay! Will be using this from now on for sure!

I recently used this as base primer for my make up, it’s very rich moisture and absorb nicely, i can recommend this for best primer make up so my make up last very long not greasy and makes skin look glowing

reviews.review_title: A must have for dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have a dry skin and a moisturizing primer is a must in my makeup routine. This stuff has been on my wish list since forever and I’m glad I got to try this now. This is one of the most hydrating moisturizers l've ever used but it doesn’t clogged my pores or break me out. It smells amazing and leaves my skin so smooth. I will definitely continue to wear this cream!

This is the perfect base moisturizer before makeup! It’s gives a good amount of hydration without being too thick under your makeup. I can see a boost in my skins brightness when using this as well. Def going to repurchase when I run out!

reviews.review_title: great nighttime moisturizer for oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product in exchange for a review; these are my honest thoughts.  PROS: - a little goes a long way! this product has a stiff texture in the jar, but melts down a fair amount once on the skin while still managing to sink in, even on my oily skin - layers well with other skincare products  CONS: - the price -- I think if this is within your budget, it's a great option for a rich, nourishing moisturizer / moisturizing primer, but I don't think it's essential - the scent -- the citrus scent may be bothersome if you have a sensitive nose - for my oily skin & preferences, I opt to use this as a nighttime moisturizer rather than under my makeup during the day, as I tend to prefer lighter textures in the daytime. if you have dry skin though, this may be perfect under makeup for you!

I have purchased a Bobbi Brown moisturizer in the past and I like that they have kept the same packaging. The glass jar feels luxe. When I opened the jar, the product was filled to the brim; another plus. The texture seems whipped, yet condensed at the same time. I liked applying it to my face and it was easy to spread. I see that it says it can also be used as a primer. I did try it that way - applied the moisturizer and then my makeup. It absorbed right away and didn’t pill like some other products can. I’m undecided if it helped my makeup stay on any longer or look smoother, but as for a moisturizer, I like it quite a bit. I am all for a two-in-one product.

A splurge but worth it for my wedding! All eyes on me (us) and with so many pictures taken throughout the day,  I knew I had to get the best products as a base for my makeup to last the entire wedding. This is where Bobbi Brown Face Base comes in. Their products are loved by many and this one is no exception. Creamy but light! As with most luxury beauty products, this has a heavy fragrance. Other than that, I would recommend!

Nice hydrating base for makeup. Went on smooth and did not feel heavy at all. It wore nicely under my foundation and gave an overall nice finish to my makeup. A little goes a long way, so this should last me for a while!

I love this this prime / moisture hybrid. It smooths the skin and makeup glides over the product so well. It feels hydrating enough to soothe my dry patches but not feel heavy under makeup . I love this product it’s so good!

The perfect hydrating primer! As someone with combo skin it can be hard finding a primer that locks my makeup in place all day while also leaving my base smooth and moisturized. This visibly plumps the skin, and keeps your skin looking like skin while keeping makeup looking great all day.

I really like this product as a makeup based to setting my makeup. This feels very luxurious when applied to your face. It’s definitely a high end product for me and I have to savor every bit of it. I do recommend it!

I used this for the first time & my goodness my new favorite primer & moisturizer in one. It made my skin feel so smooth and i used it underneath my makeup and it gave me the smoothest look i've ever had! Love this so much

Bobbi Brown is one of the creams that I liked the most since you don't have to put many products on your face because it offers you hydration and at once it prepares the skin for makeup. My face looks great since I started using Vitamin Enriched face base. I highly recommend it

I've always heard nothing but rave reviews on the vitamin enriched face base, so trying it was long overdue. That being said, it's pretty pricey, but when you consider the fact that's it's a primer and a moisturizer and it has tons of amazing ingredients: like a mix of vitamins B,C, and E that condition and nourish the skin, hylaluronic acid, squalene, and Shea butter that instantly hydrate, plump, and prep the skin while delivering a gorgeous healthy glow.

i absolutely love this product! it is the perfect primer for make up use but it also super moisturizing and plumps the skin. i defiantly would recommend this to a friend! the smell is also so nice, love it!

I love primers that feel like a treat. That feels luxurious to the skin, make the application of makeup feel exciting, and most of all… work! This primer is smooth to the touch, easy to apply, you don’t need much, and it helps my makeup stay on all day.

I am obsessed with the formula of this moisturizer! It is so creamy and hydrating, it is the best base for my makeup! I love how rich the formula is, specially for the winter time. My makeup goes on so smoothly and flawlessly on top of this moisturizer.

This product is such am amazing base. I have combo oily skin and I still enjoy it. It’s very moisturizing. Sometimes I even use it on its own. It’s lightly fragranced but nothing offensive.  It is more on the high end side but I think it’s worth try.

I’m not 100% sure on this product. It’s mostly because it is a primer + moisturizer combo. This messed with my head in terms of my skincare routine because I usually do moisturizer > sunscreen > primer so it confuses me when I should put on primer. I’ve been using it on top of my sunscreen and only thinking about it as a primer. As a primer, it reminds me a lot of the Milk one that comes in a black tube. It has the same coolness feeling when applied and a similar consistency.

This vitamin enriched face base is a 10/10! Packaging is great. The smell is a citrus scent but not overwhelming. Leaves your skin with a healthy looking glow. Can wear it alone or underneath makeup. Helps my makeup last all day long and still look amazing after hours of wear.

I love this product- Bobbi Brown never disappoints! I’ve never had a moisturizer that’s also a primer, 2-in-1 products are always a plus. The scent is a light grapefruit and geranium that’s fresh and citrusy. Left my skin feeling smooth and ready to apply makeup!

What a beauty staple! This cream is so luxurious in there, a glads right onto the skin and absorbs fast! I still like to use SPF underneath this product, but my make up still goes on top smoothly! It definitely helps to shrink down the size of pores too!

A wonderful base, the texture is pleasant, the smell is incredible for me. It will definitely be great for dry skin, but the base is also good for my combined skin, there is a feeling of lightness. I use it purely under make-up, but I think it can also be used as a cream, the face will have a nice natural glow.
i love this product! the milk hydro grip used to be my holy grail until i tried this bobbi brown base! i am obsessed 10/10

Been wanting to try this out for years and finally got my hands on it. Great primer and moisturizer but I’m not too entirely sure if it’s worth the price point. Does keep my face moisturized for makeup though. Only giving 3 stars because it took a long time for it to get to me and not too sure about the value and price point.

Honestly I’m not a huge fan of this. It’s fine. It does the job but it does the job as the same product at a cheaper price. So I don’t think I’d buy this I’d rather just get the generic version instead.

I am lovvving this! The winter has had my skin so dry and This has got me hydrated and I feel so Glowy! It definitely has helped my makeup application as well and makes my foundation flawless! Absolutely love it.

This Vitamin Enriched Face Base is awesome. This primer makes a huge difference for my make up routine.  My face is instantly nourished and plumped and, any my skin is ready for the foundation. I like that it works as a primer and moisturizer, two in one.

I’ve been using this moisturizer for a while and love how this feels on my skin. It’s a very hydrating moisturizer and lasts a while too. I’ll definitely continue to repurchase this as I feel my dry skin really benefits from this

When I put some of this cream on my skin I already loved it.  It spreads very easily and the feeling of hydration is instantaneous.  This cream is perfect to use in this colder period.  My skin was very dry and flaky.  This cream improved my skin by 90%.  I am simply loving using this cream in my skin care routine.

I now see why this product has been such a staple for many. It wear beautifully alone or under makeup. It hydrates and shows my skin instantly looking more plump and fresh. It adds subtle glow, but still sinks into the skin.

Skincare meets makeup with this luxurious, high-quality priming moisturizer.  Vitamins B, C, and E along with hyaluronic acid, squalane, and shea butter deeply nourish and hydrate, leaving my dry, sensitive skin much more dewy. Combined with a subtly smoothing effect, I find that my foundation and the rest of my makeup apply so well after this.  At $66 for less than 2 ounces, it is expensive, but if this is in your budget, I highly recommend it.

In love with this product!  Incredible how it has left my skin lately, days ago I had dryness on my face and this cream has fallen like a ring on my finger, incredible how my skin feels after applying it and with makeup the finish on my face is spectacular!  I love this moisturizer, it's perfect to use before makeup 👌🏻❤️

This cream makes my face so smooth and is the ultimate base before I apply my makeup on Saturday night! It provides a nice layer in between my skin and my makeup and doesn’t make me break out. Would recommend

This product has been my holy grail since I started using it. I’ve tried so many other creams and moisturizers and this one by far is the best. It’s perfect in my skincare routine and also using it as a base for my makeup! Will definitely buy again

I absolutely love this Bobby Brown face base, it is moisturizing and create a perfect base to layer makeup. It gives a dewy look to my face but is not greasy. I have extremely dry skin and this base helps heal the dry patches and gives a smooth base. Also, a little goes a long way so this will last you a long time.

My skin absolutely loved this moisturizer. It is very hydrating and calming. It is very lightweight and acts as an excellent primer under the makeup. It helps for seamless application of founds and feels very light on skin.

If you are looking for a skincare & primer product this is the one; It’s definitely all in one. I have combination skin and used this after only spf or alone if is night and let me tell you this product will let your skin feeling smooth & soft. Your makeup will last hours and never had an issue with my sling feeling greasy or looking oily (and that’s an achievement for me) It has a subtle scent, and a creamy consistency; with a little bit you can cover all of your face & neck.

I was impressed by this product. It’s the perfect thing to help prep your skin before makeup. Super hydrating and helps the makeup lay very nicely. My only critique is the fragrance. It does have a perfume-y smell and I tend to prefer products that are unscented. Other than that, great product.

I’ve been wanting to try this for quite some time and now I understand the hype. This is truly a skincare makeup hybrid that peeps your skin by creating a beautifully hydrated base, smoothing the skin without being overly dewy or tacky. It absorbs quickly into the skin and has really improved the longevity and look of my makeup application.

reviews.review_title: An amazing primer and moisturizer - 2 in one
reviews.review_text: This product works amazing as both a moisturizer and a primer. It leaves my face feeling hydrated glowy and fresh and my make up lasts all day and does not crack at all. Ever since i’ve been using this - so many people have complimented my skin and asked what I am wearing!! 10/10 recommend

This moisturizer has seriously made a big difference on my makeup prep. I’ve been using this moisturizer as a primer while it nourishes, plumps, and preps all in one step. It makes your skin look so hydrated and healthy. I can see how well it improves the look of my foundation. It also makes my foundation blend more smoothly. This moisturizer is multivitamin-enriched with vitamin b, c, and e, which helps replenish and condition skin with essential nourishment. It also contains Hyaluronic Acid, Squalane, and Shea Butter, which helps instantly hydrate, plump, and prep skin for a fresh, healthy-looking glow. It feels very rich and lightweight. Its also fast-absorbing texture cushions skin and grips foundation for smooth, flawless makeup application. Some of its ingredients are Grapefruit and Geranium (helps firm the skin) fragrances leave a light uplifting scent on skin.

reviews.review_title: much needed addition to your makeup routine
reviews.review_text: I love bobbi brown products, but especially this primer. it goes on so smooth and makes my skin feel dewy without being oily, as i suffer with oily / combination skin. i put it on after moisturizing and before my makeup and i love the finished look it helps to achieve.

reviews.review_title: A product I wish I had tried sooner
reviews.review_text: I’ve always heard such wonderful reviews about this priming moisturizer, but was always hesitant to try it out since I have such oily skin. I was worried it would be far too heavy/rich for my skin, but I was wrong! It’s extremely moisturizing, but very lightweight on the skin. It creates a beautiful, smooth canvas for make up application and never feels greasy. It does have a light citrusy scent, but I find it to be very enjoyable, and it doesn’t linger on the skin. She works well with lots of other products, including SPF. This one is definitely worth the hype.

This Bobbi Brown Vitamin Face Base is just perfect.  It goes on so nice.  The texture is dreamy!  This was made to go under makeup and it definitely wears well!  I love that it creates a smooth hydrated canvas.  The ingredients are so nourishing.  Definitely loving this one.

I was actually really shocked at how much I like this. I didn’t have any real expectations since I don’t think I’ve ever used a primer that really made much of a noticeable difference. But THIS seriously made my makeup look fresh all day and gave it a blurred look. You don’t have to use very much either.

This moisturizer is so good! I have been using it for a long time and I am obsessed! How how moisturized my skin feels after using it. It is on the thicker side but it doesn’t feel bad on the skin! Works amazingly under makeup!

I was always a little hesitant about this product because of the price but I 100% understand the hype now! My makeup has never applied or looked better! This makes my skin feel & look amazing! It’s definitely worth picking up!

I’ve heard so many people rave about this primer over the years so I was super pumped to try it out finally! I have really dry skin and being able to moisturize and prime at the same time has been a game changer! I’m obsessed!

This priming moisturizer works amazingly as a primer and/or a moisturizer. On days when I'm too lazy to put on makeup, I'll just slather it on to hydrate and moisturize my face before applying sunscreen. As for days when I do apply makeup, the product pairs well with my foundation as it sinks in nicely into the skin without leaving a greasy finish. I love how it leaves a nicely satiny glow on my skin and doesn't cause pilling with my sunscreen or any other makeup products. On another note, this product has a citrusy scent and I absolutely love how good it smells.

reviews.review_title: Love the texture and the after feeling.
reviews.review_text: I absolutely loved this primer moisturizer.  It works really well with the cushion I use. Highly hydrating and it makes my skin looks very smooth. Light to medium weight and it absorbs really well into skin without being sticky or flaky.

I love Bobbi Brown products so no surprise I love this! It’s a moisturizer and a primer in one - what more could a girl need?! Leaves my fave feeling fresh and glowy and my makeup lasts throughout the day.

This is my new holy grail. I have been using it constantly for about a week my foundation and base makeup have never looked better. I also feel like it is helping my oily skin stay under control during the day!

I have a lot of trouble wearing makeup in the winter due to how dry I can get. I am so glad I found this product as it completely helps that issue so I can have smooth looking skin all year long. This also goes on so smooth!

I received this product complementary from Bobbi Brown in exchange for my honest review. I have wanted to try this product forever! It gets so much hype. I’ve been testing it out as a moisturizing primer right before makeup and I love it. It’s hydrating and also smoothing on my pores. I know it’s a little pricey, but if you have dry skin, this is a game changer!

This is amazing it primes first and moisturizing at the same time. Gives my skin a plump through the day and hydrates it very well. The ingredients I love doesn't irritate my sensitive skin and smells amazing!

reviews.review_title: The best primer and moisturizer combo
reviews.review_text: This is my must have! I used this everytime before my makeup to create a healthy canvas. It is the perfect primer and moisturizer combo. Be aware that it has a fragrance but overall I am so obsessed with this product!

Absolutely love this moisturizer. Can see why so many people rave about it as a great skin prep before your makeup. It gives your base so much hydration without leaving your skin oily and doesn’t pill at all.

This one has become my favorite face moisturizer. I needed this. My skin feels so soft and smoother than before. I do use it before applying all the makeup and it works. My skin looks definitely more hydrated. The cream is lightweight, just the right consistency. No strong scent to it.

I love this! It really helps as a base layer before the foundation is put on. Your foundation does not settle. It does not have a smell either which is important to me. This is a must have before i put my make up on!

I absolutely love this face primer moisturizer from Bobbi Brown! I love using this to prep my skin before applying foundation. I love how this helps to create a smooth canvas. It’s super moisturizing and a little goes a long way!
Great product under makeup! Creates the perfect, most hydrating canvas for foundation! Not greasy, lightweight and perfect for any skin type!

I received this from Bobbi Brown cosmetics. I did not really like this base product. I did not like how it made my makeup looked once I applied my foundation. It made it pill and look streaky. I won’t repurchase

After this being so popular for years I finally tried it, and people are right it is good! It really hydrates and preps the skin for makeup so it apples flawlessly. I paired it with a matte foundation to make sure my skin was properly moisturized before that type of formula. I have combo skin so I think in a glowy foundation I might be a little shiny with this primer but I love nonetheless

Good product. Easy to spread on fave. Not oily!  Hydrating  for my combination oily to dry skin. I have been using this cream base for about two weeks ago. I have acne prone skin & this is one of the few moisturizing cream bases that does not make me break out. Works well on my skin and will continue to use it,

Loved using this Vitamin Enriched Skin Base under my makeup! It’s really lightweight yet hydrating. I like that my makeup lasts all day and that I don’t feel greasy event though I have combination skin. Glad I was able to try this product!

I loveee using this for my dry and sensitive skin. It works great both as a primer and moisturizer all in one. It leaves my skin feeling prepped and glowy and makeup applies easily with it. I also love the vitamins in the formula as well, it works great on my skin

wow this is a great product to put on under your makeup! I've never had my foundation go on so smooth. It gives you the perfect canvas to have your makeup last all day. The product also smells nice and is a soft creamy texture. Packaging feels very luxe!

So far I have been using it as both a primer and a moisturizer in my skin care routine and I absolutely love it. It makes my skin feel amazing and I love the 2 in 1. It also make my skin feel smooth and nourished.

This moisturizer has been flooding my TikTok for you page for a WHILE so I’m so happy I finally got it. It is a great moisturizer base before putting on makeup. The texture feels amazing on my skin and I appreciate the minimal packaging.

I’m obsessed with this. I have dry, sensitive skin and this primer plays so nicely with my moisturizers and complexion products. It gives an extra boost of hydration and glow while settling into a really weightless finish. New favorite primer!

Really love how moisturizing this is as a makeup primer. Matte primers have been a little challenging for my skin type and this one gives a nice healthy glow and dewiness with my makeup. Gifted/Free by Bobbi brown

Honestly so obsessed with this product!! I use this as both a moisturizer plus, a base before applying makeup.  It always leaves me with a smooth and glowy base that is perfect for dewy every day makeup looks!

I was dying to get my hand on this and oh my, it’s absolutely amazing. It has a fresh scent but soft. I’m not a big fan of primers in general because of the texture but this one has more of a soft moisturizer, which I’m obsessed with. It doesn’t clog pores and makes the foundation glides on the skin. This primer is absolutely a must

Loving this two in one skincare and makeup primer. I’ve used it a few times and it leaves my skin moisturized and prepped for my makeup. Great base. Minimized oil and allowed for a smooth foundation application

This primer is one of the OGs!! It moistures and preps your skin but has the most beautiful priming effect. There is a slight lemon scent but it’s so faint you can’t tell. It’s not sticky or tacky but gives the perfect smooth base! You will LOVE this all-in-one!

It’s moisturizing and definitely helps for a smooth makeup base. It’s a bit pricey so I’m thankful I received it for review. It’s worth it if you have the money to get it. It makes your makeup look good and helps with the appearance of your skin

Amazing base. Works with every single foundation and keeps my skin glowy and moisturized. I find it to work the best with no other skincare (I have combo skin), because otherwise it’s too heavy. But overall amazing product!!!

I’ve heard so many good things about this product and it definitely did not disappoint! It gives the skin a healthy glow and hydrates all at the same time. Makeup lays on it well as a primer and as a moisturizer!  My foundation did not move and my skin did not feel heavy. I get the hype now that I’ve tried it! Plus a little goes a long way.

I am in love with this product. It’s honestly my ultimate favorite primer/moisturizer combination. It has such a nice light citrusy sent to it which just makes it so refreshing and nice to put on my face. Overall I just really like the lightweight feeling of this product.

I had always heard a ton of hype around this Bobbi Brown product so was super excited to finally try it. It has a light citrus/orange scent that I think is very pleasant. The texture of the cream looks thick but is actually very light when applied to the skin and is quickly absorbed. It leaves my skin feeling moisturized and soft and ready for makeup application. Can definitely see this becoming a staple in my routine!

I’m obsessed with this vitamin rich cream. My skin feels so much smoother and softer after using this cream. I love applying it before I apply my foundation for a smooth base. I also love how it works well with my sensitive skin.

Love this cream! It’s so rich but also moisturizing and doesn’t seem to clog pores! I love to use it in my routine and would recommend. Everyone needs to try it! I will be purchasing because it’s my new fav

I’ve been using this product for a while now. I love how it’s mild scented. It has great creamy texture but lightweight on the skin. It’s a skincare staple for me all year round. I use it before applying my make up and it is long lasting, believe me when I say it is because I work 12 hour shifts in a very stressful environment.
