I felt like my skin is nourished and glowing everytime I use this moisturizer. Overall, amazing product! I would definitely buy again in a heartbeat .

It smells really fresh (lemony?) but it’s not too much. I’ve found that a little bit really does go a long way. This melts into the skin and helps my face feel moisturized and for makeup to go on smoothly. I honestly haven’t noticed if it increases the longevity of my makeup, but it does make my complexion look healthy!

My goodness, I thought at first I misread the package and this was a moisturizer. It’s a primer that works wonders and definitely hydrates the skin to a plump smooth flawless looking finish. My foundation glides on my skin and settles without pilling. My face looks airbrushed and so healthy looking. I am truly impressed!

This product has changed my makeup routine for the better! It’s super hydrating for the cold dry winters I experience but isn’t so thick that it feels heavy. It keeps my makeup in place all day! Absolutely obsessed

This is a very very good primer to use in the winter!! My skin is quite dry, it gets even worse in the winter, but this helps me out a ton. It keeps my skin nice and hydrated, and it makes my base application look so nice and smooth. I now understand the hype!

Love this primer!! My makeup went on perfectly underneath and it did not clot my pores. Has a very light and pleasant smell that is not at all overpowering. This is a fantastic product and I definitely recommend.

This is my first Bobbi Brown product and I have to say, I agree with the hype! Applied super smooth, feels light on the skin, and seems like it would be good for all complexions. Not a super strong smell.

This product was kindly gifted for testing and giving my honest opinion. I have very dry skin, extremely dry so I am always looking for think and enriching moisturizers. I was surprised by this product. My skin absorbs this and it hydrates it quite well for a few hours. It doesnt really last all day the hydration but moisturizes for a good 6 hours which is great for me ( I dont mind re-applying) If using makeup it blends beautifully and does not affect your foundation. I think this is a great product and good for people with super dry skin like myself.

I had heard a lot about this product but did not believe it until I was able to give it a try. Complimentary of Bobbi Brown, this product is incredible. I put it on before my makeup and it makes my makeup look stunning.

i absolutely love how this makes my skin look!! after using just a few times my skin is so plump and hydrated!! the scent of this is super light but very nice!! it is a bit pricey for my liking but worth it!!

This is the best matte base moisturizer ever- it sets your face while moisturizing it and makes it amazing for makeup application. It’s packed with amazing ingredients and the texture is so so amazing!

There’s a reason why this product has been my holy grail product for years. This face base is literally the most perfect formula and it goes on effortlessly. So smooth and melts into the skin. Pairs perfectly with foundation on top. The reviews speak for themselves. Get it if you haven’t yet, you would love it.

I truly enjoyed this innovative product! I live the fact that this two in one product is moisturizing and keeps the makeup secure without over drying the skin. The scent is there, but it’s nothing too overwhelming.

What a great multi-purpose product. I love that this is a make up primer but has the added benefit of moisturizing ingredients. It's a great base for make up and I don't experience and pilling. Absolutely love and highly recommend.

I’m always looking for skincare that pairs well under makeup and this is it!!! It’s smooth and so light! It layers well and makes my skin super plump while holding my makeup all day! I also love that the fragrance isn’t super strong!

I have been enjoying this face base so much. It is such an easy and effortless primer to use. My skin feels instantly nourished and plump. It feels hydrated and it looks healthy too. My foundation looks so much better with this base. It is also easier to blend out. I love that this base is good for your skin because it is multivitamin-enriched. I really enjoyed the light, citrus scent as well.

Wow this face base is incredible! I love that it doubles down as a moisturizer. It goes on smoothly, preps skin for makeup great. I do wear it on its own without makeup. I love the glow my skin gets with just this product on. Definitely a staple!

This is such a nice face primer! It is hydrating whole helping smooth out skin and pores. It leaves a beautiful finish that makes my skin feel dewy. It pairs well with foundation or by itself! Definitely recommend

What a beautiful product! It can definitely be used as either a moisturizer on it own or as a hydrating primer under makeup. I've used it both ways and love it both ways. It's a super thick, rich cream that melts into the skin and really leaves your face soft and smooth and glowy. It works beautifully with all the makeup I've tried it with. I haven't had any sort of pilling issues at all. I also love the refreshing citrusy/spa scent!

I have used Vitamin Enriched Face Base and I have loved it, I love the finish it leaves on my skin, it leaves my face hydrated and blends very well with my makeup.I recommend them, despite the fact that the product is not very large, I think it could last a long time.

I absolutely love the face base as it is the perfect primer and moisturiser to prep my skin before makeup. My makeup sits smoothly, blends well and lasts longer with this. I highly recommend this primer!

This product was sent to me for free. I had wanted to try this for a while but I personally did not like the way it was separating on my face. I had worn a starface patch before applying this and whatever is in that patch does not mix well with the bobbi brown primer! Other than that my face felt moisturized!

I’m loving this cream so much so far! I tend to have drier skin in the winter, so this is the perfect base prior to makeup. It’s so soothing and nourishing, I’m obsessed! Also, the smell is so nice—I love the citrusy scents that linger throughout my day!

Bobbi Brown you are the best! I love this product so much. It works perfectly, it’s like a mix of moisturizer and primer and makes my makeup looks flawless. The texture and fragrance are prefect too. Definitely recommend it!

I just love everything about Bobbi brown,they always have the best product especially for skin care.Its always luxury looking.It smells so fresh.It makes my face look more smooth and shiny.Totally worth it.

Loving this product as it hydrating and a lifted a long way. I’ve noticed, I use less makeup because the application goes smoothly. I have normal to dry skin and it’s perfect for me. Would recommend buying an eye cream.

Absolutely love this facial base and I’m so happy I got the chance to try it out! It leaves your face feeling supple and supported in moisture. I love pairing this with my foundation after and it looks great.

I really enjoyed this product! The smell is absolutely amazing, I love the orange scent. The product was very moisturizing. I didn’t notice a huge difference as a primer under makeup, but it feels amazing on the skin.

Obsessed with bobbi brown. I was introduced to the brand about a year ago and they don’t miss. This cream is lightweight and silky. I have combination skin and I find this cream hydrating. It’s overall a great product and love that it has vitamin c!

This cream is so lovely as a primer! Using it under my makeup means my skin is hydrated and smooth. My makeup goes on smoother and looks so much nicer because of the primer. The light scent smells great too.

I really enjoy this primer. I have skin on the dry and sensitive side, and I like to layer this under my sunscreen in the dry winter months. This is lightly scented, so something to note if you’re sensitive to fragrance.

This product truly is a holy grail of mine. I absolutely love using this under makeup, or even on days when I'm not wearing any. It leaves my skin looking hydrated but not oily, which is perfect for my combo skin. It smells great too!

reviews.review_title: Adding this to my makeup prep routine!
reviews.review_text: This cream smells and feels like a dream! Using this for my skin before applying makeup leaves the perfect amount of hydration, and helps my makeup apply onto my face smoothly. Using the perfect amount kept my skin looking and feeling good throughout the day, as well as my foundation!

I adore multitasking product and this face base does it all! This is a great way to moisturize your skin after cleansing and other skincare before diving straight into your makeup routine. It has a light and clean citrus scent, making for a luxurious experience from start to finish. My makeup lasted longer and my skin looks great!

I recently started using Bobbi Brown's vitamin enriched face base. It is thick but absorbs quickly and is super hydrating to my skin. It is scented, but is light. It acts as the perfect base to my makeup.

First timer using any product by Bobbi Brown, and I’ve really enjoyed it. A little dollop goes a long way! My skin immediately absorbs in the moisturizer as it has been so cold and dry. A very lovely product!

This is such an incredible make up primer. I used this on half of my face before applying foundation and definitely notice a difference. Ie: improved pores and overall skin texture. I apply a small amount and a little goes a long way

love using this before my makeup! i put this on, then spf and my makeup looks really smooth. i have acne prone skin and so far this hasn’t affected or given me any breakouts. it’s also a good moisturizer even if u have oily skin.

this is one of my favorite primers as a MUA. it works for all skin types and it’s very hydrating and smoothing. i use this for many of my clients and i love its dewy finish! it mixes well with other skin products too

I saw a TikTok beauty guru use this I I decided to give it a try. I love it!! It made my makeup look so good and airbrushed. Such a great base. I have normal to oily skin & this didn’t make me super oily at all.

I'm pretty picky about my primers, but I really like this one! I love the moisturizing aspect, and the creamy texture is lovely. I do think it works better with certain foundations-I've tried it out with a few different ones and some of them work great while some seem to separate a bit. Overall, though, I'm very happy with this!

Okay now this product had me feeling luxurious. Loved everything about it from it’s packaging to the product. My skin felt soft and plum right after after using it and the next morning. This product is amazing and I will continue using it.

I have been enjoying this product more than I thought I would! I use the same primer every day. However when I incorporated this product into my routine before my makeup application, it made a noticeable difference. My skin looked smoother and more even after putting makeup on. I also love the texture of this product. A little of it goes a long way !

I love how rich this face base cream is.  Its not heavy on my face but its not thin and watery so i feel like i get good moisture locked in. Love the aesthetic of the bottle and the smell of the cream itself.  Really overall happy with this product.

reviews.review_title: Needed a Trial Period For Me
reviews.review_text: An OG primer from the old school youtube days! What I love about it - the moisturizing aspect. It feels super nourishing on the skin and has a light refreshing scent. What I’m struggling with - how to make it look good under makeup. My favorite foundation looks great with it, but some of my formulas create a super separated look which is really difficult to fix. I have quite dry, sensitive skin.

I recieved this product complimemtary from Bobbi Brown  This is a very rich and creamy primer. I loved the way it felt when applying it. It is a creamier formula than I expected, not waxy at all. my makeup did break apart under my eye near my nose but I am not sure if it is due to this product.

I have normal/combo skin with some dullness, fine lines and texture. I typically use liquid concealer and powder foundation for my everyday makeup. I was pleasantly surprised by the whipped but creamy texture of this base. It went on so smooth and light but felt like a nice moisturizer at the same time. I was anxious to see how it would play with my typical powder foundation routine and it didn't disappoint! I let it sink in for a few minutes so that my skin felt moisturized but not tacky and then applied my concealer/foundation. Both products went on great and didn't cling weirdly or bunch up. It truly is a great base for makeup. I haven't used a primer much after loving how my makeup looks more with just moisturizer underneath but this gave me the best of both worlds. I feel like I got a nice smooth base but also super hydrated skin. I also love that it has a skincare aspect to it also so that I get the short term effect of my makeup going on smooth and also the long term skin-loving ingredients. A little goes a long way also! Highly recommended!

Definitely a rich moisturising primer which helps to prep my skin for makeup and make it look plump and hydrated. As in winter season my Skin needs special attention as it gets dry and patchy easily so this primer helps to set my makeup flawlessly. Bit pricey but when you see ingredients list then its worth the price. Totally obsessed with this.

I’m a firm believer that the preparation of your skin before applying make is the most important part and Bobbi Brown delivered all I’ve been looking for in this product.  It prepares my skin for a fresh, healthy looking glowy makeup. The absorption of vitamins is super quick and grips the foundation to the skin but make it hydrated and plumped looking.

This product keeps my face so hydrated throughout the day. My make up looks dewy and not too cakey. The formula isn’t too sticky so my makeup goes well over it. This is a great priming moisturizer for everyday use

This Face Base did a good job of priming my skin for makeup. Usually my face gets oily throughout the day, but this helped control the oiliness while still effectively hydrating. The citrus-like scent is nice and (in my opinion) not as overwhelming as others have said. However it might not be the best for very sensitive skin. Lastly, the price point is quite high and I feel like a similar effect can be accomplished with alternate face products.

I really like this face base cream by Bobbi Brown. The packaging is luxurious and the product was filled to the top. It has a light, fluffy, cream texture and smells citrusy and clean. I enjoy using it and think it does a great job of priming my skin for makeup. I definitely recommend this product.

I absolutely LOVE this moisturizer/primer combination product! It makes my dry skin look hydrated and gives it such a lovely, healthy glow. It also makes my makeup look absolutely amazing and helps my foundation truly become one with my skin. A little goes a long way so it will last a long time, especially since they fill it all the way up. This is, hands down, my favorite primer.

This is just moisturizer is just ok. It seems rich and it feels beautiful on my skin. It dries slightly tacky which I find perfect for wearing well under my makeup. I just can’t get over how strong the fragrance is on this product. It has a very strong perfume-like scent and I feel like it never truly dissipates. I can smell it on my own face all day and I don’t like that. Although I never had a reaction to the fragrance in this moisturizer, I worry that others with sensitive skin might. I won’t be repurchasing this product when better, similar products exist.

I will continue to use this product, but for the price, I don’t see it doing anything special that my skin care that I currently use doesn’t do. I feel like if I used moisturizer before my skin care it would be the same thing I also think that people should be aware that it does come with us sent so if you have sensitive skin be careful.

The Bobbi Brown Face cream is so hydrating and especially so for winter skin when I tend to have more dry flakes. It also works beautifully as a primer under makeup, allowing my makeup to go on effortlessly and flawlessly. I am really impressed with it and will continue using this product for years to come.

This smooths my face and makes my foundation look amazing! I completely forget I even have makeup on while I wear this. Highly recommend for daily moisture and where ever else you need it! like it . .

I don’t often change primers because some of them don’t work well with my skin however, I am starting to fall in love with this primer moisturizer from Bobbi Brown! I love how it moisturizes and hydrates my skin while at the same time helps prime my makeup. So far, this seems to pair really well with the BB cream foundation that I use. This primer has definitely help keep my makeup on longer than it normally does so that definitely makes me feel happy & it’s worth it!

I have been really enjoying this face primer. I rarely use foundation, but when I do, this is a staple. It helps my makeup go on smoothly and helps with making it stay on my face longer. I wish there was no fragrance though.

reviews.review_title: No more cakeyness! Gives a healthy look
reviews.review_text: I've actually used this moisturizer a few years back when I used to do makeup on customers and this was the most popular product in my makeup bag because I feel like it catered to all skin tones regardless if you were dry skin, oily skin or combination skin. I found myself reaching for it all the time. It just always made the products I put on top look better. It has such a lovely scent like creamy citrus. The consistency reminds me of souffle it's very lightweight and airy with a whipped texture. I have combination skin. Now that I have a fresh one in my hands again I remember why I loved it so much! When I wear this product under any foundation it always balances any dryness I have so my foundation doesn't look cakey and it doesn't make me any more oily. I'd suggest if you do have oily skin just use another mattifying primer over your oily areas OR powder those areas before applying foundation and after this moisturizer. It's a lovely product that adds health to your skin and gives you a flwaless base. I recommend you try it out!

I love this Vitamin Enriched Face Base. I use it as a moisturizer and primer for my makeup. My skin looks so hydrated & plump. Makeup lasts all day and dont look cakey. I love how lightweight it is and the light citrus scent.

Best product ever!!!! It makes my makeup look so good and it makes it last!!!! Honestly I would 10/10 recommend even tho its on the pricy side i would repurchase again. Plus a little product goes a long way.

I absolutely love how buttery and smooth this goes on my face. It is easily my favorite primer now and the makeup I use sits so nicely on it without getting cakey like it usually would. I’ll definitely be using this now in my everyday makeup routine

really like this moisturizer!It's hydrating and is a solid base before your complexion products. l'm not a huge fan of the smell it has but it fades away after a while. Love that there's a creamy application but it doesn't leave any heavy residue!

reviews.review_title: best primer in my makeup bag!
reviews.review_text: This is officially my holy grail priming product! I love using it on my face before makeup because it provides the best base. It's hydrating but not overtly oily under makeup and keeps my makeup looking wonderful while also keeping my skin happy and hydrated!

I love skincare that is made for makeup. This moisturizing primer instantly plumps and preps my skin for a flawless makeup look. My skin is hydrated, and looks healthy. It is lightweight and fast absorbing.

reviews.review_title: A great addition to my routine
reviews.review_text: I really loved this product. I think it paired so well with the foundation I received as well. The scent was very pleasant without being overwhelming. I love the feel of this on my skin, and it absolutely did feel hydrating yet felt like a primer at the same time. I did receive this product for free for review purposes, but these thoughts and opinions are my own. I’m excited to keep using this. I really enjoy how it feels and how it performs.

This primer is unlike any primer I have tried. It is truly moisturizing and provides a great base for glowy healthy complexion. In areas I usually look dry it was a lot more hydrated. My only issue with this base is it’s heavily fragranced and lingers for a while.

This product is perfect for under makeup, is not so greasy but super hydrating to prevent foundation going dry or looking cakey. Something I like also is the texture and packaging, is perfect for on the go as the consistency is not liquid

This is a fantastic primer that moisturizes and hydrates my skin! Perfect as a makeup base. The ingredients are fantastic with a blend of vitamins and hyaluronic acid, squalane, and shea butter. I'm excited to continue to use it!

Absolutely obsessed with this face base. It smells so fresh and clean and almost a bit citrusy. I love how hydrating it is on the skin and how beautifully it sits. It’s my first Bobbi Brown product and it’s so luxurious!!! Love.

An incredible product for an incredible base! It’s smoothing, moisturizing, and non irritating.  My makeup looked flawless after using this product. I have combo skin and this didn’t make me oily at all

Loved everything about this Bobbi Brow Vitamin Enriched Face Base.  The smell is fresh and very soft and the texture is amazing. My skin looked and felt soft and my make up stayed in place the whole day. Totally recommend it

Great base for makeup. Very hydrating and priming for the skin. I have been using it for a few weeks under makeup and helps it go on smoother! Will be repurchasing the product once I run out- a staple in my routine now!

This moisturizer / primer lives up to the hype. I definitely can understand why this is a lot of peoples holy grail. I find this to be super moisturizing without being tacky or oily. My products sit nicely on top of it and blend easily.

This product was for free by bobbi brown. I’ve been looking for a cream to use with my makeup and I think i just found it gives an instant glow and hydration making my skin look plump. The ingredient list is impressive! It’s lightweight but does the job

Want to start off and say the packaging is so beautiful.   As well as the soft citrusy smell. The product itself went on smooth and left the skin feeling really soft. My makeup went on great with no flaking or issues.

This moisturizer is a great base and primer for under any kind of makeup. It is not too heavy on the skin. It has a slight scent to it but it has so far not irritated my sensitive skin. Will continue to use as a primer and base.

This cream is beautiful. It smells amazing and the texture is hydrating and thick without being goopy. I’ve used a LOT of primers that aren’t moisturizing enough and my makeup looks flakey or cakey. This one is perfect for me

I am trying this moisturizer for the first time, and I must say that it is really beautiful. It acts like a moisturizing primer and provides a wonderful base for your makeup. It is very hydrating and feels great on the skin.

I love this product so much.  I pretty much have lizard skin in the winter, and this is the only primer worth anything to me from November to march.  It’s so thick and lovely and keeps my makeup from literally flaking off

I really like this product a lot! The packaging is beautiful and the consistency of the product is so moisturizing. It's an incredible base before applying makeup and will continue to recommend to my friends!

I love this primer. It's a great mix of moisturizer and primer. This face base is nourishing and priming but without any greasiness. This is a great two-in-one product from Bobbi Brown and I love it as one of my morning makeup prep steps. It will give you a wet hydrating and glowly base. This moisture base enhance my skin all day. Helps with anti aging to keep my skin moisturized all day. Smells wonderful, light wear and a little goes a long way. Perfect for dry skin. Worth every penny.

It’s my first time trying a Bobby brown product and I’m shook at how amazing it actually is . Not only does it do a fantastic job at priming I also have been using it as my moisturizer! The way it leaves my skin feeling so plump & quenches my skin . Definitely worth the buy !

This primer is rich, thick and highly moisturizing. Perfect base for dry/ combo skin or any skintype during winter. Can easily replace any moisturizer. I can see why this product is legendary! The quality is great

I love the texture of this cream. It works so well under my makeup as well. It does have a mild scent to it which I love. It leaves my skin feeling plump and healthy. Definitely a must have in your skin care routine.

I enjoyed using this product are used it more so like a moisturizer than a primer, but it can also be doubled as a primer. The packaging is also sleek and beautiful. Will hopefully try out more Bobbi Brown products.

I love my vitamin enriched face base by Bobbi Brown! It works as a moisturizer plus a primer and has a really nice citrus smell. It doesn’t feel cakey or thick and makes my makeup last all day! I highly recommend!

I was so excited to try this moisturizer and it surpassed the hype! I loved it under makeup, especially in the winter it gave me a hydrated and smooth base. When I wear it alone it almost perfects my skin, love it!

This is a super rich and luxurious cream that leaves my skin feeling so soft and hydrated. It’s lightweight and non-greasy formula that doesn't leave your skin feeling oily or heavy. I love using this in the morning as my daily moisturizer. This primer has a creamy and smooth consistency that glides on easily and absorbs quickly into the skin. Huge difference in how my foundation sets on my face.

Ive always been looking for a good moisturizer that would look good under my makeup. Tried the bobbi brown face base for the first time and It really made my makeup look AMAAAZING! My makeup lasted all night and it gave a dewy look. I also love the smell and consistency of this product. Love it!!

A must have moisturizer! Great for under makeup, it’s hydrating, great for all skin types, and I also keep one for my kit. I carry the full size and travel size as well. It really leaves my skin bouncy and perfectly prepped for makeup.

I was kind of weary about this product because it seemed greasy based on the thickness, but I was very wrong! It left my skin feeling moisturized and was tacky enough for my makeup to stick into it. My makeup was still looking flawless at the end of the day without getting too shiny

This is a really great moisturizer that is also a primer. The cream applies smoothly and does not feel sticky. It leaves my face feeling moisturized. It works great under foundation. I can highly recommend this cream!

I’m not going to lie, I get confused/frustrated when products are called by a certain name other than what they were, like a moisturizer. BUT, I totally get it after using this and I’m obsessed! I’ve used this every time I’ve done my makeup since I got it and my makeup stays on so much better. It’s super hydrating, and it gives a slight “tacky” type of hydration that just locks in my makeup, making my face look so glowy and smooth.

Now I see what the rave is about. First I all, the container was filled to the top 😄 Second, wow the moment I applied the primer, my  face felt immediately softer and looked more youthful. I love that this primer has skincare ingredients too, so if you’re always in a rush like me, I definitely recommend this two in one moisturizer/primer.  It also absorbs more pretty fast!  Your foundation will look flawless thanks to this amazing base/primer. I also tend to use it on its own without foundation and I love how my skin looks, not greasy, not matte just the perfect in between.

I love this moisturizer for days I wear makeup! While it’s very hydrating, it still feels like a primer, which not many moisturizers are. I like having a dedicated moisturizer to apply before makeup, and sometimes I’ll even apply this later on over my regular moisturizer

Omg this stuff feels so luxurious as moisturizer!  And as a primer it works amazingly!!! It really smoothens everything leaving my face looking pore less! Also, it helps my makeup last long & stay looking fresh!

Such a great moisturizer and base. It makes my skin feel hydrated and my tinted foundation goes so smoothly over the top. I haven’t tried a better moisturizer than this one. It’s a new staple in my routine!

This one's a WINNER!! BOBBI BROWN has done it again! I'm all about my multi-tasking products, especially because layering too many products makes my skin look very textured so I was thrilled to try this out. This is basically your facial cream and makeup base all in one, and let me tell you this makes my skin feel so soft and cushiony. My makeup glides onto the face so easily and looks super smooth and even. Skin prep is so essential for makeup to lay perfectly on the skin and this face base is definitely the key! There is a light scent to it but it's very pleasant and doesn't linger for anyone who make not be a fan of fragrance. I really like using this as just my daily moisturizer even because of how amazing my skin feels. This product is a winner in my book and I will definitely be restocking it!

Okay so this is my new go-to primer before my makeup routine. It makes your face tacky so the makeup sticks perfectly! It feels hydrating on the skin but gives the perfect base for foundation and lasts all day.

Now I understand the hype over this product. I love how it’s both a primer and a moisturizer! My skin feels and looks very hydrated. My makeup looks amazing.  It has a clean scent and the formula is a bit thick but I love it.

I have always been a fan of Bobbi Brown, but it has been awhile since I’ve tried a new product! I jumped at the Vitamin Enriched Face Base because there’s nothing I love more than an all in one product which not only moisturizes, but also works as a primer.  I LOVE that I can choose to wear this product on its own and have a glowing face! I would describe it as a pearl/iridescent finish that works beautifully under my makeup. Living in Houston where the weather is constantly changing, this product is a must have!!

I really enjoy this product. This is a great primer product! I have been using it under my makeup and it makes my skin feel very smoother and moisturized. I would recommend this product to anyone who needs a new primer to try out!

This two in one primer/moisturizer is a new favorite of mine! It preps skin for foundation application and gives you a healthy glow! Made with vitamins B,C and E. Hyaluronic acid, squalene and shea butter. It’s an absolute must to help enhance your makeup application! Love Bobbi brown products and this one will not disappoint you.

This makes my makeup last all day and still look Dewey for that perfect soft glam look. I have extremely dry skin and this product kept my makeup intact and looking better than ever for over 12 hours and counting. My makeup was not flaky and my skin looked amazing honestly I love this for dry skin.

I really loved this vitamin enriched face base. It gives such a perfect canvas for makeup application. My skin was smooth and my makeup looked perfect all day long. I have sensitive skin but this didn’t make me breakout. I prefer this moisturizer to my usual primer . It does a great job as a primer and moisturizer.

I finally tried this out after many years and it did not disappoint! It’s moisturizing and feels so good on the skin. It doesn’t feel greasy at all and a little goes a long way. It paired nicely with my foundation.

Now i see what the hype is about. I’ve heard nothing but great things about this product and so happy to finally try it out. This is the perfect primer under my base. I love that it doesn’t leave me feeling oily.

I’m obsessed with this primer base!   It instantly nourishes and preps my skin with healthy hydration to improve the look of foundation. The texture is rich, yet lightweight. I like that it doesn’t leave my skin greasy.  This product leave a light scent of the grapefruit on my skin and I love it.

I struggle with fine lines on my smile lines. I’ve tried everything and this is the best product I’ve used so far. It keeps my skin well hydrated under my make up, minimizing creasing. This product is super moisturizing!

reviews.review_title: I have loved this for years, it’s amazing!!!
reviews.review_text: This face base has been a staple in my routine for over two years, I’m on my third jar with absolutely no plans on slowing down. I adore how this gives me moisture, and a smooth canvas before my make up. I also even wear it on days when I don’t wear make up because I love the glow, it gives my skin the hydration is everything I need for my dry skin. I love it if you’ve never tried it, give it a try I think you would be completely blown away it’s worth every penny!

This moisturizer is my absolute favorite. I have to use it every time that I do my make up or else I feel like it does not look right. I face feel super nourished and smooth when I use it. I have put everybody that I know onto this moisturizer and now it is their absolute favorite.

have loved this product so far. I know that it is also a primer but I used it without makeup and I enjoyed it. It’s a little thicker which wasn’t that bad and blended in so well. A plus is that it smells good too!

It feels really nice in the skin! It makes the skin feel really soft and hydrated, making the products go on top of it so smoothly! I sure understand all the hype about this product now! Really recommend it!

This product is nice! It provides a great base for my makeup and makes my skin feel hydrated and smooth. My one complaint is the perfume smell. If you are sensitive to smell, this may bother you. It also is pretty pricey, so I have to use it more to determine if it’s worth it.

This I received this product complimentary from Bobbi Brown. I’ve only used this product once but what a game changer. I could definitely see a difference not only in my skin but also in the application of my makeup. I will definitely be keeping a product like this in my beauty stash and I can’t wait to see how it performs with my other makeup products

Love this moisturizer and that it’s a 2 in 1 product. I can eliminate adding a primer if I’m in a rush since this also primes your skin. It’s a little thick for my personal taste but it quickly absorbs into the skin. Love how it smells and it plumps my skin so nicely!

I’ve heard such good things about the face base so was looking forward to trying it out. My skin is on the drier side and pretty sensitive. I’ve been using this under my concealer and foundation and feel it preps my skin and makes it feel softer. Luckily it hasn’t caused me to break out either.

This is the perfect base for the skin. It definitely feels like a moisturizer with the effect of a primer. My foundation looks so much better and lasts longer as well. It has a nice scent and feels great.

I really like this more than I thought I would! My makeup applies beautifully over it and makes my skin extra smooth beforehand. If the price tag scares you, just know that a little goes a long way. This will last me a very long time.

My makeup has never looked sooo smooth!!! The way it made my skin so hydrated and smooth was the best prep for my makeup application. I have gotten the most compliments on how nice my skin looked than I ever have. It’s great that this has a blend of cigoto help “feed” my skin to give it the best moisture. It is really a great primer as I’ve stated it’s made my makeup look so much better than anything I’ve ever tried.

This product is so so incredible!! It makes my skin feel like silk, so smooth and the perfect base. I love this so much and it definitely feels like a luxury product. I recommend this to anyone looking for good skincare!

I really like this product The thick cream melts into the skin and the formula works amazingly well for softening dry patches. It's one of the few moisturizers that gives a thick, almost primer like feel.  It worked well with the two foundations that I use.  I also use this product on its own as moisturizer even if I don’t wear foundation. The only thing I am not a fan is the fragrance, though it won’t stop me from wearing it had a citrusy scent that vaguely reminds me of cleaning products. Not unpleasant, but it didn’t add anything to my experience.

I love incorporating good skincare into my daily routine and this is a new favorite of mine for sure! It leaves my dry skin very plump and hydrated. I love the glow my skin is left with and don’t even get me started on the citrus smell, it is heavenly!!

I have had a mini sample of this face base and fell in love with it. So I was very excited to have received a bigger size. This product is amazing because it doubles as a moisturizer and primer kicking out two makeup steps in one. I love the consistency and it doesn’t feel heavy on the skin. It’s very blendable while also very moisturizing.

This primer is a cult classic and I don’t know how I haven’t tried it until now. It’s so rich and hydrating. It’s the perfect makeup primer for my dry skin. My makeup applies seamlessly over it and looks fresh and lasts all day. Iconic!

This is the most amazing prep and base before makeup! It leaves your face with the most velvety soft skin and so smooth. I love how silky all over my face is after I use this leaving it the perfect canvas for my foundation etc. I especially like how hydrated and moisturized this is as well and quickly absorbed into the skin. Leaves no pilling or residue, the perfect thing!

I can see why this is a cult classic primer favorite. It feels like skincare in the sense that it applies like a smoothing moisturizer, and contains vitamin c, niacinamide, Squalane, and more. I think it could work for many skin types, but this primer is perfect for extremely dry skin like mine. 10/10

The Bobbi Brown Vitamin Enriched Face Base is an absolute necessity for dry skin. It's thick but a little goes a long way and immediately leaves skin feeling hydrated, plumped, and refreshed. It wears well underneath any foundations I've tried and can also work on its own if you chose to just use this instead of a moisturizer.

I am in love with Bobbi Brown’s Vitamin Enriched Face Base Priming Moisturizer $66/1.7oz, a 2-in-1 Moisturizer Primer!  It’s incredibly rich yet lightweight and moisturizing because of the Hyaluronic Acid, Squalane, and Shea Butter. My skin feels plump and hydrated with a smooth matte finish, prepped and primed for foundation and other makeup. My foundation and even winged liner & brows stays in place.   A little product does go a long ways making the cost per use an excellent value.  Cons: Does contain a noticeable amount of fragrance - grapefruit & geranium - a refreshing though strong citrusy combo.  One wish to make this an even better product - SPF!   Another winning Bobbi Brown product for m

Bobbi brown just blessed my face! This vitamin enriched eye base is so smooth, usually in the winter I have dry cracked skin and the vitamins in it help so much! It has no white cast and goes perfect underneath makeup! The scent is perfect and not thin or thick!
BEST BASE EVER. I will now add this as one of my holy grails. This is such an amazing product! Leaves my skin smooth and hydrated. Love it a lot !

The primer feels so light yet so moisturizing! It creates such a nice base and glide for my makeup. I use powder foundation and appreciate the “cling” it provides for my makeup. Bobbi Brown always makes the best products so I wasn’t disappointed!

This is a super rich and luxurious cream that leaves my skin feeling so soft and hydrated. I like using this in the evening and I wake up to skin that looks so fresh and glowing.  No breakouts from this, just supple and smooth skin!

She is THICK and I’m here for it. I love using this in the morning as my daily moisturizer. I’ve legit been using it every day.  The perfect base to my makeup, absorbs quickly and acts almost like a primer

I was so excited to see this 2 in one product from Bobbi brown, and it works just as well as I hoped. It’s really moisturizing but dries very quickly leaving your skin smooth ready to make up. Highly recommend this huge time saver!

I’ve used this product for about a week now, and I love it! My face does not feel heavy, or like there is a lot of product on it, it’s very light weight on the skin. I will be repurchasing this product.

I finally understand the hype. This is the perfect hybrid of a moisturizer and primer in one. It works great on my combination skin. It hydrates beautiful and leaves you with a near powdery feel to the skin. My foundation looks amazing over top.

This is my new, holy Grail I used to use thick primers. But this is going to be my go to from now on this is so light weight but it’s still filled in my pores, which is honestly so surprising because it’s so hard to do that and it made my face look very glowing.

I absolutely love this product! Definitely one of my new favorite moisturizers. So hydrating on the face, soaks in nicely and doesn’t leave my skin oily, looks great using it as a prep before applying my makeup. My skin looks flawless after using and Barely any scent!

Dewy and moisturizing! This primer moisturizing is perfect for dry skin and for make up prep. My biggest piece of advice is to let this sit for a minute before going in with foundation or concealer. A little bit also goes a long way! This packaging is beautiful and feels luxurious. It felt blurring but yet hydrating. No weird smells to this. Would recommend!

I’ve always wanted to try this product since I would see YouTubers always using it but I didn’t know if it would work for me since I have oily skin. It did. It didn’t make me oilier and my makeup applied so smooth on top of it. If you’ve been wanting to try it you definitely should.

This moisturizer is a bit thick for me. I like to use this only in the evening as a heavy pm routine. In the morning my face does tend to get a bit shiny so it's too heavy for me if I go all natural. Under makeup it looks fine.

This works shockingly well at hydrating and priming. Leaves somewhat of a gripping feeling without feeling like primer or gross - meaning feels lotion enough to wear as face lotion but grippy enough to feel like your makeup will stick well. Definitely recommend

This is honestly a kit staple. I’m a makeup artist and I swear by this enriched face base. It is always the perfect base for almost every client when doing the skincare portion before makeup. I also love the smell.

I love this moisturizer, applies great and feels amazing on my skin. I apply it a few minutes before my foundation and it doesn’t make my makeup heavy or wet. I like the thickness of it, I don’t need much per application.

My skin is dewy and glowy af. Make up looks really blended too and it looks so natural sitting on my skin. I rarely used primer so I see the hype now. Bobbi Brown never disappoints! My only suggestion is give it atleast 5 minutes before putting on your make up or foundation or else it will cause cakiness coz product has not been fully absorbed by your skin yet.

This Bobbi brown vitamin enriched face base is a dream! It has a slight citrus scent. It’s a thin to medium consistency texture wise and it spreads easily across my face. You don’t need much product to cover your face so the jar will last quite a while. I love that it is enriched with vitamins and feels very hydrating on the skin. The perfect base to prep your face with.

I love Bobbi Brown products. My favorite ever is their Serum Foundation, and this vitamin enriched base goes perfectly with it! It absorbs quickly and it gives my face a natural glow without feeling greasy. I recommend this product!

I have very dry/sensitive skin, so I was looking forward to trying this out especially after reading the reviews from others with dry skin stating that it was an excellent moisturizer. After trying this out for almost 2 weeks, I would say for me personally that this moisturizer works well as a night cream, however during the day (even on my dry skin) it looks a bit too shiny/greasy for my own personal liking. I prefer a semi-matte look though, so if you’re someone who prefers a more dewy looks + has dry skin, this may be perfect for you. I can’t imagine how it would look on more oily skin types though (I’m guessing greasy, however I can’t fully comment on that).   The fragrance is ok, although I would like it more if it was fragrance-free. All in all, I’d give this a 3/5 simply because I have other night creams I prefer more + this looks too dewy/shiny on my face during the day. I am giving it 4/5 on this review however because it makes an EXCELLENT hand/cuticle cream!!

Wow I love this face base! I have been using this layered on top of my AM moisturizer for about a week and am super impressed with this product so far. I have definitely noticed a difference in my makeup applying more smoothly and love the added layer of hydration. There is no strong scent, my skin feels moisturized but not greasy, and a little goes a long way. Super happy with this and will continue using!

Wow ! Love this base cover. Huge difference in how my foundation sets on my face. I'm getting more of a dewy smooth finish. Not a huge fan of the scent but not too strong so it's ok. I use a very small amount so totally worth it!

So far I like this product. This doesn’t leave a white cast on my face like other products do which is good. It’s pretty light weight. Doesn’t feel heavy at all. My makeup goes on smoothly with this. Definitely like the way my makeup wears using this primer.

This primer is my new holy Grail. All my dry skin baddies need this primer in their life. It is the perfect base for flawless concealer application. I usually only spot conceal my face and under eyes, so I really value a good hydrating primer before hand to make sure it blends seamlessly. A little truly goes a long way with this thick creamy luxurious base. I usually don’t like scented products, but the light citrus scent is really nice.

I love the Vitamin Enriched Face Base. It is the perfect hybrid between skincare and primer, and as far as I can tell, it would work well for most skin types. I find it hydrating, but not greasy, and it provides a nice canvas for base makeup. Glowy, but not too glowy; tacky, but not too tacky. Also, the scent reminds me of orange peels, which is nice. Awesome!

I have a combination of oily skin tones, and I love this vitamin-enriched moisture. I use this as a moisturizer and primer. It makes makeup go so smoothly; after using this, I noticed my pores look much smaller. The texture is very creamy but not grassy looking, and I love the smell of that cream. Highly recommend this if you're looking for moisturizer and primer at once.

Bobby Brown never fails me. The product does what it says and keeps my skin feeling moisturized during these harsh winter months when I need a thicker base. I use this as a moisturizer on its own as well as a base for my liquid foundations. Would recommend. My only negative is that it is a little pricey.

Love love love!! This product is super moisturizing on the skin & perfect for skin pre before makeup! I’ve been using it every day since I received it. I will most definitely be purchasing this product again.

This vitamin enriched primer helps my face makeup stay all day and makes me feel like it’s also skincare. It hasn’t irritated my skin and I’d recommend it as a base. I don’t mind the smell and it arrived intact

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: WOW! I’m obsessed with the Vitamin Enriched Face Base Priming Moisturizer! Right off the bat, the the cream looked so rich, almost like butter. I was hesitant to add it to my routine since my skin can get oily, so I tested it as an overnight cream. It’s light weight and ultra moisturizing on the skin but not greasy! It has so many amazing vitamins which help revitalize my skin while moisturizing. I love the scent too which is a huge plus! After reading other reviews, I’m so excited to test it out as a primer. It’s definitely a must have of mine already and will repurchase!

I live this brand so much. This primer is very easy to apply it just glides all over my skin very easily. It leaves skin so soft and makeup looks really good on top of it. It doesn’t make pores disappear but it does reduce the appearance of pores.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love love love this product! Without primer, my makeup looks dry and flakey and will not last as long. I’ve tried many primers, but this is a nice blend of skincare and primer so it feels great and makes my makeup look even better.

I received the bobbi brown vitamin enriched face base primer as a gift. It was a little thick at first and i was questioning it but it made my face really hydrating. My makeup came out so nice i love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Bobbi Brown Gifted me this. I absolutely love this brand. So I knew I would absolutely love this product. I left my skin super glowy and luminous before applying my make up. So I totally recommend this to any make up lover.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizing base is so supple and preps your skin to be makeup ready. I definitely feel like my makeup looks much more even after using it and I like how soft my skin looks. My product was gifted from Bobbi Brown.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Bobbi Brown Vitamin Enriched Face Base is an excellent product for those who want to give their skin a boost of hydration and vitamins before applying makeup. The primer has a creamy and smooth consistency that glides on easily and absorbs quickly into the skin.  One of the best things about this primer is that it is infused with vitamins and minerals that are beneficial for the skin. These vitamins help to nourish and revitalize the skin, leaving it looking smooth, refreshed and radiant. The primer also helps to create an even canvas for makeup, filling in fine lines and pores, and creating a smooth surface.  The primer has a lightweight and non-greasy formula that doesn't leave your skin feeling oily or heavy. It feels comfortable on the skin, and it doesn't cause any irritation or breakout. The primer works well under all types of makeup, providing a flawless finish, making it easy to apply foundation or concealer on top of the primer, without any caking or creasing.  In general, the Bobbi Brown Vitamin Enriched Face Base is a must-have product for anyone who wants to have healthy-looking and hydrated skin. It's perfect for all skin types, and it works well with all makeup types. It's a quality product that provides a beautiful finish, nourishment and perfect base for your makeup to go on top, it's definitely worth the price, and a little goes a long way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really love the ingredients in this primer however it is somewhat thick. You only notice it at first and it does not feel that way all day. It smells so good! The packaging it also nice. My makeup went on smoothly and I’m excited to see the results.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Great value for this product! I like this primer because it makes my pores look smaller and helps my makeup go on smoother! Only thing is I like a more dewy look and this is very matte. I also like the vitamins/ minerals in this product so it’s good for your skin!

reviews.review_title: Great to make your makeup looks better
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this primer because it works well to prolong the wear of my makeup. It deeply hydrates my skin helping lock moisture, leaving my complexion supple with a boost of radiance while blurring pores that perfectly function with any cream liquid or powder foundation keeping it in place for hours.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is such a staple in my routine! I’ve been using it for years now and will continue to! Probably not best for super sensitive skin but I think this is a great base for your makeup! I’ll continue to buy it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First, the texture is very buttery and greasy, but it goes into the skin so fast!! This is like the perfect face base primer you can find to go under your foundation in winter time. I like the smell too, and the packaging feels so luxurious,  it looks amazing on my vanity.

reviews.review_title: I can’t believe I waited so long
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a game changer for your makeup! I soo wish I would have used this earlier and not waited

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great product for those of us who want a very natural look. I applied this before the BB foundation and then difference between just a moisturizer and this product is amazing, gives a  nice and polished finish, not cakey at all. Definitely a new part of my routine when doing make up.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This face base has been on my list to try for so long and I’m glad I was finally able to try it! It’s like a moisturizer/primer in one. It leaves my skin feeling plump and even. I really like the smell of it and a little goes a long way! I also love the luxe glass packaging

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This has easily become my new primer ! You can put this on before your makeup and no matter what it’s going to leave your makeup looking flawless! It’s also super hydrating and doesn’t leave you feeling greasy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Obsessed. My skin looks amazing with and without makeup while using this. I love how moisturizing my skin feels and the way my makeup looks over this primer! I definitely recommend it! It’s definitely giving flawless

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I can see why there’s so many people hyping this up. It has a beautiful close to it in my face make up looks extremely flawless and glowing and I’ll be adding this to my routine more!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It has a pleasant texture, easily absorbed, leaving the skin feeling hydrated, its smell is exquisite and I love that it can be used as a moisturizer and primer.  The makeup looks cute and radiant , I like that with little it reaches for the whole face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Bobbi Brown gifted me I didn’t know I needed this and now I’m surprised I wasn’t using this already 😂 It has a very soothing fragrance and can be used as a moisturizer by itself (I have combination skin). It grips the markup pretty well so full points on the primer function as well.

reviews.review_title: The perfect moisturizer and primer all in one
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Bobbi Brown vitamin enriched face base is the perfect moisturizer and face primer all in one. After heating up some of the primer on my fingers to activate it I can feel the instant hydration. There is an uplifting smell of grapefruit, with vitamin C, E, and other great ingredients to plump and leave your face, feeling fresh with or without make up. Applying make up after sun and primer is easy and make up can definitely last longer with this perfect surface.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this in exchange for my honest review. I love that it’s lightweight in texture and it’s meant to be a moisturizer and primer in one. It’s definitely nourishing and makes your skin just feel good all around. A little goes a long way and I really enjoy it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Bobbi Brown Vitamin Enriched Face Base surely does moisturize. It has a slight fragrance to it. So be mindful of that. It leaves my skin extremely soft and smooth. I don’t know if I would use it as a primer but I would def use it as a daily moisturizer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely LOVE THIS PRODUCT! I have super dry skin and this is the most nourishing primer I’ve found that works well with all foundations and makes my makeup last. My skin always looks naturally hydrated and moisturized without coming across oily or over made up when I use this. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Bobbi Brown Vitamin face base is amazing! It so hydrating which allows my makeup to look flawless. It has a slight fresh lemon scent that make your skin feel refreshed. Best of all is that it not greasy yet so hydrating.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is literally one of my all time favorite products. If you use it before your makeup it makes your skin ssooo hydrated and soft. It also gets tacky after a few seconds so your makeup stays snatched for the whole day. All of my clients say it smells soo good every time I use it on them too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been trying this vitamin enriched base and I am very impressed with it. It applies flawlessly and it does indeed help my make up stay on for longer now. I will continue using it for sure as it is a great product.

This cream smells so good and has calmed down my itchy skin so much. My medication tends to dry me out everywhere and this lotion is such a relief for my skin. I no longer want to scratch myself til I bleed. Lol. Best lotion/cream ever!!!

reviews.review_title: Excellent combo product for dry/mature skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m a Bobbi Brown junkie (I love the brand’s concealers and correctors) but I had never tried this face base. As someone with maturing skin, I get terrible dry patches where my makeup doesn’t stick or sticks too much. This primer is perfect because it’s moisturizing and plumping, and makes for smooth and even application and good adherence to both liquid and powder foundations. I prep my skin with toner and Niacinamide serum, then go straight to this - no need for a separate moisturizer meaning fewer layers and smoother makeup. It really helps keep makeup looking super soft and fresh all day. I set with loose powder through the center of my face and my makeup looks great all day. In this photo I used it with the Bobbi Brown Skin Longwear Weightless foundation & Skin Full Cover concealer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This surprisingly worked well on my oily skin. I love the way my foundation applied after I let it sit for a while. I would recommend not using a lot though. Also don't at it to the spots you get really oily on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great multitasking product. I love that it’s both a primer and moisturizer. I’ve been using it under my ELDW foundation and it’s been working really well. I like how nice my foundation goes on when I use this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My first impression of this product was how thick it was. Once I rubbed it together and used it on my face it felt ok. It has a nice smell and it worked really well to keep my makeup in place though out the whole day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have heard so many amazing things about this product and I finally got my hands on it! I can see why it’s so popular, the formula is so beautiful! It is light weight yet ultra moisturizing on the skin but not greasy! It has all the amazing vitamins my skin needs especially right now that I am entering my 30’s and need all the skin plumping products! The scent is so light which is a plus! I tend to have oily skin so I really love how radiant this makes my skin look but never oily. Definitely a must have and must repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is gold!  I have been using this for just over a week now and I am seeing such a change in my face.  I love how soft it feels and the fact that it contains vitamin c for my skin.   It also contains hyaluronic acid which gives my skin a youthful glow!  This is so easy to work into my routine I just apply in the morning before work and I’m set for the day!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Okay omg! This is the product that I needed. With my skin being dryer in certain areas having a moisturizing base primer is a win! My makeup sits so much better in my face.  I will continue to reach for this product in my makeup routine .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The vitamin enriched face base by Bobbi Brown has been one of my kit staples for years! This is one of those products that just works exactly as it says. It’s a beautiful combo of moisturizer & primer while giving your skin an extra boost of nourishment & balance for an exceptional smooth canvas for your makeup applications. I’m able to use it on a variety of client skin types and textures & little goes a long way. I Have openly recommended this product for years & it hasn’t changed today!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love the Face Base Cream.  I have this on my vanity at any point. It works great under makeup and just great for those no make up days. I love how moisturizing it is but not heavy. I definitely recommend checking this out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This vitamin face base is a dream! It has a really lovely citrus scent. It’s thick and luxurious without being heavy or pore clogging. It primes the skin beautifully for a face of makeup and it’s nice to wear even if you’re going makeup free. It gives the skin a really beautiful glow.
